name: Prayer Warrior Princess
text: I cannot say enough about Shane- owner of Gipson Heating and Air Conditioning. In order to give a better understanding of my situation let me say, without the intent of trashing anyone or their business, that when our system was replaced two years ago by the company that installed it, (who I also called for help yesterday when it stopped working), it malfunctioned quickly and flooded a bedroom ruining drywall and requiring extensive repairs. Eventually it had to be completely replaced as it never functioned properly. The replacement system needed a few tweaks, but eventually it seemed to work consistently and well and did for nearly a year- until yesterday. So, I contacted the company who installed the system and they were unable to come out immediately, nor could they give me a timeframe for their arrival.  It was 80 degrees inside, I have pets, and I needed someone there sooner rather than later. Shane wasted no time in getting to my house to assess the system and set to work immediately. In the process, he educated me on the system and gave me a complete rundown of what exactly was wrong, including a list of issues caused by the installers of the system, which were contributing to the malfunction of it. He also hauled off a large garbage bag of trash that the installers left in my attic! Additionally, his service charges were so reasonable I actually questioned him about it! His reply was basically that he would rather be good to customers, charge reasonably and fairly, and get great reviews and referrals than charge exorbitant amounts of money for his services! I was blown away! Now my air is working beautifully, I didn’t spend a fortune to get it fixed, and he has a customer for LIFE. Try Gipson Heating and Air Conditioning. Their work ethic, professionalism, quality work product, and positive results speak for themselves!

resp.text: Our pleasure to help and thanks so much for the review!

name: Cohen Johnson

name: Ashley
text:
First, let me mention that I have never written a review for any company or even a product I've purchased and loved from Amazon but Gipson Heating & Air Conditioning deserves a review.  I don't even know where to begin because they are so AMAZING.  The owner of this company literally has the key code to my front door because he is so trustworthy.  I wouldn't hesitate to let him babysit my children because he is such a great guy.  His staff as well.  My story is unique because what started with me calling him out to talk about a duct cleaning turned into my husband and I gutting our entire home for a remodel (for other reasons) and we wanted a brand new system.  Shane came out to do a load calculation to help us pick the perfect system.  He was so detailed that he climbed into the smallest, most cringy area underneath a stairway landing in my basement. I felt like I was watching the show Fear Factor because you couldn't have paid me to crawl under there!!  We sat down at the table and he explained with so much detail the system I needed.  What I found to be so funny, is that I have never met a HVAC guy that was so passionate about his work.  I thought I was going to have to kick him out because, at one point, I think he started doing algebra equations based on how many windows I have and insulation in the house and whether the sun rises or sets on backside of my roof...LOL.

Anyways,  this remodel has taken two years and I don't know how many times he came out to my home to help me before I ever paid him a dime.  I have a longer chain of text messages to him than I do to some of my friends.  He has just been there to answer every...single...one of my questions. I have a beautiful new HVAC system now, all new ductwork, gas lines for my hot water heater and two fireplaces and an additional ductless, mini split system installed.  There is not a better, more skilled, or more honest HVAC company in this area....period!!

resp.text: Thanks so much Ashley for the nice review!

text: The Gipson crew, Shane, Trevor, Anthony, and Evan did a fantastic job. They are courteous,  professional, hard working young men. name: Barry
text:
The quality, value, professionalism, responsiveness and dependability options in this survey all apply to Gipson Heating and Air but honesty is what I like most about this company. They have Serviced my 15 year old home unit for two years now and have never tried to sell me a new unit. Shane (the owner) always says he can keep it running with routine service and by topping off the freon at the beginning of each summer. He recommends this as it is cheaper for me and the best option with kids in college and a new unit is not needed right now. Previous HVAC companies pitched the need for a new unit based on age before even inspecting it.

But when it comes time for a new unit, as it was when Gipson replaced the 30+ year old unit in our rental house this summer, it was another positive experience with this company. Shane checked the unit, explained why this unit could not be repaired (it had rusted through in many areas) and recommended the best and most affordable unit for replacement. He even set me up with financing which allowed for payoff in six months with no interest.

It’s a very vulnerable feeling when you have problems that you don’t fully understand and feel like you are at the mercy of the repair tech’s information. I don’t have this feeling with Gipson as they take the time to explain and actually show you what the problem is before making the repair (Shane sent pictures to me at work when a fan motor needed replacing during last summer’s service).

I cannot recommend this company enough strictly based on their honesty and work ethics.

resp.text: Thanks for the review and your trust in us!

name: Donna Gabriel
text:
I have had many experiences with HVAC personnel over the years. I’ve been a homeowner for 26 years and am on my second Trane heat pump system.
It would not be an exaggeration to say that Gipson Heating & Air Conditioning gave me the most thorough service I’ve received in those 26 years. They not only performed the seasonal maintenance on my unit, but discovered and remedied additional problems. They even corrected mistakes made by previous contractors which could have led to a malfunction of my unit in the future.
(One example: I had been dealing with a condensation problem in my air handler and Shane Gipson explained why it was happening and fixed it immediately. By the way, the condensation was caused by the omission of an important step which another company’s rep had not bothered to return my call on, much less offer to remedy.)
Shane Gipson’s knowledge and expertise was surpassed only by his willingness to go above and beyond what he initially came to do. And he patiently answered all my questions (I had many).
I urge you to give Gipson Heating & Air a call when you next need maintenance work or repair on your heating/air unit, no matter the brand. You will not be disappointed. In fact, you may be amazed that there are still those who have such a work ethic and hold themselves to such a high standard. And you will be left with peace of mind, knowing that no stone was left unturned in the care of your system. I thank Shane and Shawn for their impeccable service.

resp.text: This really means a lot to us and we thank you for giving us the opportunity! Thanks so much for the review!

name: Brandon Dowd
text: Shane and his guys were great. They were very knowledgeable and went above and beyond to make sure we were happy! Highly recommend.

resp.text: Glad you guys are happy with new system!

name: Gregory Smith
text:
After nearly 40 years of homeownership, can say without a doubt that working with Gipson Heating & Air was one of our best experiences. Knowing we had two 20 year old HVAC systems, we were faced with replacing both systems. As a result, we did our due diligence to obtain quotes, which sadly took over a month to get three that were actually apples-to-apples .

We were nearly ready to pull the trigger when we came across Gipson. Not only did we get a quote FAST, but their quote was incredibly detailed; including sketches of our ductwork. In retrospect, this wasn't a big surprise, since Gipson actually did a full, comprehensive review, well beyond the cursory inspections the others did. Gipson asked questions the others didn't, revealed critical items the others missed, and provided additional details that truly benefited us. Their best suggestion was flipping a horizontal system to vertical. Yhis change gave us a tremendous amount of additional attic space, a genuine bonus!

We could go on singing Gipson's praises but will wrap up by simply saying all work was performed exactly as quoted, the installation was top notch, was done as promised and on time. If you need HVAC work done, one call is all you will need - and that's to Gipson.

text: Fast, quick, efficient, and respectful. Communicates well and friendly. Will use again!

resp.text: Thanks so much for the opportunity and the review!

name: Jacob Lucus
text:
My sister had them come out to replace her entire heat and air conditioning system.  She received a few quotes from companies and although Gibson was not the lowest they were the most professional and were willing and able to do the entire job and not leave a whole in the wall to be fixed by another contractor she would have to pay.
I agreed to stay at her home so she would not need to take a day off work and we wanted someone at the house incase there was a problem or questions that they needed to check with us before doing.
The owner showed up a few minutes before the agreed on time which was before his normal business hours because my sister asked if he could start early so I would not have to say there all day.  By 9 am he had already removed the old unit and started getting the new unit ready to install.  When his employees arrived they immediately came up to me and introduced themselves.  The two employees were clean and neatly dressed.
While working they took the time to clean as they went never leaving a mess or tools laying around.  I watched the entire crew (owner included) and they all worked very well together and each of them seemed to care about the job as the owner.  All would answer any questions I had and were more polite than I can ever get my children to be.  I requested some very minor changes to the was a drain line ran and they immediately agreed and said it would not charge the price.
When they were done all their work looked so neat, clean, and organized.  They went back with my sister and me both explaining everything they did and why they did it.  They went over what she had asked them to do and made sure she was happy with everything.  While working he also found a few other things that were not up to code that he fixed to bring everything around the unit up to the latest codes.  While the owner was doing all this his employees were cleaning everything they were even near.  They vacuumed a carpet that had probably not been vacuumed in a long while and swept out the entire garage.
When it came time to pay he said he already told her the price.  My sister asked about any extra costs and the owner explained that he does not believe in changing the price after agreeing to the job and any extra cost that occurs he absorbs.
In my opinion these were some of the very best contractors I have ever been around working in my home or someone else's.  All the employees seemed to enjoy their job and the company they worked for.  Great job all of you.

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words! We’re glad you guys are happy with new Trane system!

name: Biju Nair
text:
Right from the beginning Shane exhibited very professional and courteous behavior. When he visited to give a quote for the A/C replacement, he thoroughly checked the existing system, measured the rooms for the size needed, wiped existing system clean and gave us good advise on maintaining vs replacing.

After I did my research of getting wire from 8 contractors, I found that Gipson's quote was midway from others. So when I mentioned that to him, he agreed on a quote that was amicable. He bought the system that I recommended Trane XR14, after my research and did a great job with the installation.

It was the best service ever with Shane sharing a ton of information about the system and it's maintenance. He was very courteous, caring and respectful and thanked us several times for the business. Overall, I'll definitely recommend him for everything technical to being amiable.

text: Came home from church to a warm house ... air running but not cooling. Came and discovered a small frog had grounded the capacitor in the outside unit which fried the capacitor and frog. Replaced the capacitor, and had my A/C back up and running. Island Air exceeded my expectation, and was very pleased with the timely service and quick diagnostic/repair ... I give them 5 stars!

This company was hired to inspect the ac in my home prior to moving in. I was told it was all in working order.

So, after being here a few weeks and having a guest stay and tell me how hot it is, I call to ask Island Air to see what is the problem, since they were the ones who said it worked great.
Well, of course, they won't come out and inspect without paying Another fee!😡
Needless to say, don't trust their word because evidently it is no good. Now I have an ac unit that does not work properly, after they told me it did. And, I have to pay someone to fix it!!😡😡😡

name: Leigh Scott
text:
We are building a new house. Our building contractor recommended Island Air-Air Conditioning and Heating, Gulf Shores, AL. My husband and I previously lived in several homes with HVAC problems stemming from poor design and installations. We knew we wanted to avoid those with new construction.

I initially met with Rob Barnas of Island Air to explain our HVAC desires. Rob and Chris designed a plan to address the "wants & needs" of our system. It's very easy to install flexible ducts improperly, but Eddie and the men ran the ducts and attached the air handlers with great care.

New HVAC systems are very expensive. I did not want to buy a new system and suffer the same issues that we had to pay to have repaired in previous houses. So, throughout the construction process I asked dozens of questions.  I'm sure this was tiresome for Island Air, but they were very patient with me. Honestly, how can anyone be expected to properly operate and care for a system unless they understand how it's supposed to work? Hahahaha. Also, I wanted to understand the system while I could still see the components. Our drywall is not up yet. We are now 4 months into construction, so not far enough along to have thermostats installed or have the system turned on. However, we are enough along for me to say I am happy this far with the work done by Island Air of Gulf Shores, AL. I will try to post again after we move in to give everyone a final report on how it feels to live in an HVAC system built by Island Air.

PS. In case you are wondering. I am not related by blood or personal connections to anyone at Island Air and have received no discounts or other incentives for posting this review.
D. Scott
Gulf Shores, AL

name: Nautical Star
text: My first experience with this company was in 2014 when I asked them to install an AC system to my downstairs add on.  The initial job was well done.  I was happy with the work that I entered a service agreement for my upstairs unit. In 2016 my trust with the company was severely damaged when the AC tech charged me for the part that was still under warranty and I had to call them on it.  To the company credit, they did "refund" me with the credit on the next repair job in the spring of 2017.  I paid the invoice without examining it carefully as I should have done.  Two months in late May of 2017, I received a letter from the Baldwin County small claim court saying that Island  Air is suing me for nonpayment.  I called them and the manager told me that all this can go away if I pay them at that point.  I went home and dug up all my paperwork and found out that they overcharged me once again on the visit in spring 2017.  I faxed them my receipts and called them the next day and advised them not to go ahead with the lawsuit because they will not win in court.  They rescinded the the court claim and offered me a six month maintenance complimentary service for my inconvenience,  but after all the shenanigans I have to walk away.  The trust factor is no longer there.  I waited for four months to write this review to make sure that my emotion is in check and to give them a fair review about my experience with the company.   Take home points?  Save your receipts and you need to know about the warranty your AC system.  Always go check the charges line by line and make sure to keep this company honest.  They will take advantage of your ignorance.

name: Kaytlen Welch
text: They charged us $150 for a $20 part, and when my husband called to politely ask why, the man who answered the phone was very rude. I've worked customer service. The way he talked to and treated my husband, who was politely asking a simple question, was disrespectful and not acceptable. The first thing he said after my husband asked was, "Oh, so you're going to tell me how to run my business?" No, sir, but it was a question you should expect if you put all the charges listed underneath the part cost. Yes, $150 was for labor and mileage, as was the $50 you listed as the service charge, but if that's what you were charging $150 for, you should write that down on the list of charges. Not rudely speak to a customer who was asking a question. Not everyone has money to throw around willy nilly. We would like to know why we were charged so much--NOTHING wrong with that. We will not go back here ever again. Especially after he threatened to take away the 30 day warranty for this $150 part.

I also have annual maintenance agreements for two residences (been in effect many years also),  the latest visit was scheduled between 1 and 3 yesterday, they never showed or called, I got a call this morning telling me it was scheduled for 8-10 this morning, this was the final straw, I told them to cancel the maintenance contract for both residences and refund the remainder.  Evidently the contract is non-refundable.  I have been a Customer for almost 10-years, but these latest experiences will have me looking elsewhere for my HVAC business.

name: Carmen Gooden
text:
Called the company because ac unit fan wasn’t blowing. When the owner got out of his truck he was already discussing a new ac unit. Kept stating unit old r22 Freon is not made anymore and is $150+ per lb. After I told him we weren’t interested in a $7600 unit he was done talking. Asked how much would it be to fix the fan since he stated fan motor was no good. He said $700+ and he’ll have to take it off to send to shop. Next day I call another company. They replaced the capacitor and fan started back working. Changed out the hard start because it was no good. Now the ac unit is working great!

Update:
Office manager Alica reach out regarding the issue I had with the service I received. She was very pleasant, thoughtful, and very understanding. She went above and beyond to resolve the issue. I’m happy with the outcome! Thank you Alica

name: Adam Lawson
text: I called them they were very polite and courteous and I had someone at my house within the hour looking at my problem they told us what was wrong with it and how much it would cost to fix and they had the problem fixed in under 24 hours and they subtracted the the consultation fee out of the total cost of the repair to make it a little cheaper on me and my family which was extremely helpful thank you all so much coming out here and getting things done so quickly if I have another AC problem I will definitely be using them again also their consultation fee was $5 cheaper than the other place I originally called so the cheaper consultation fee and their speed of service getting out here to tell me what the problem was is exactly why I chose to go with them and I'm not disappointed that I did ; we called them on Friday afternoon and Saturday morning we had cool air they were also very informative and knowledgeable they shared all the information with me and my husband to help us understand exactly what was going on with our air conditioning unit they also informed us of some other things about our central heater and our Freon tank and when our unit was the created how long it's supposed to last; they really filled us in and updated us on a lot useful information about our unit that we didn't know anything about and that will be very helpful to us in the future our central unit is very old about 15 years old and I had to go all the way to Birmingham to get the part for our old unit and I still had our AC fixed under 24 hours I'm sure for anyone out there that has an AC that's 10 years or younger they'll be even faster for y'all and I were exceptionally fast I called 3 places and they were the fastest with a real-time estimate of exactly what time they could be there to look at my AC and they were at my house 30 mins after i initially called them and asked them to come out anyways thank you for fixing our unit and to everyone out there reading this review if you're looking for a good AC company this one's a great one

name: Tomi Bree
text:
Half eaten breakfast burrito left on one side of my drive way and on the other side, barf; that's right vomit in my drive way.

Destroyed the base board under the air handler closet, left a two foot mark and gouge on the wall adjacent to the air handler closet, ran into the hallway wall with hand cart and left tire tracks on the flat paint.

I called my salesperson, who sent out a supervisor, Steven; they cleaned up the half eaten food and vomit and came inside to see the damage, Steve suggested to get me in contact with their painter and paint over the mark/gouge and the destroyed base board.

I asked them to leave at this point; I have never been more upset on a business performing thousands of dollars of work for me.

resp.text:
I offered to fix everything before you threw me out. Did not even get the chance to fix it.
I drove over as soon as you called in the complaint.
Within 5 minutes you threw me out. I was not rude to you and offered to make everything like new..
Sorry I could not make you happy but you never gave me a chance
Thanks for your business
Steve Dukes

name: Kathy Gwizdala
text: We recently had Baldwin Heating & Air Conditioning install a Generac Generator for our home on Mobile Bay. We are so very happy with our overall experience with this company. In fact (no lie) less than two hours after the final hook-up, there was a sudden storm, the electricity went out and the generator came on. It was seamless!!! We did have a misunderstanding with the salesman but once we brought it to the attention of Steve Dukes, the business owner, he quickly and decisively took care of it. Because we are on the Bay, we wanted the generator elevated so that, should there be flooding, the generator would be safe. That request hadn't been conveyed to the installers. However, when Mr. Dukes was made aware of the oversight, he actually constructed a metal stand for us himself. Plus he did this very quickly so that the delay was minimal. We were thinking they would build us a wooden platform, but the metal one is much better — both functionally (as it will last longer) and aesthetically. We are from Michigan and we had no intention of being here through hurricane season but we had traveled here with my 94 year old mother and, because of the coronavirus, she couldn’t fly back and she can’t physically tolerate such a long drive.  I was afraid that, because of the misunderstanding, we would be relegated to the bottom of the list and have to wait until they could “get around to it” because they were so busy...not so! There was only a slight delay while the frame was fabricated. So, fast forward to the present time: We had “bugged out” when Hurricane Sally was about 100 miles South of us and just now walked into the door after Sally had passed through. There is no electricity on either side of us but we walked into the door with the generator humming reassuringly beside the house. I don’t have to worry about Moms Bi-Pap or oxygen condenser working. She will be able to sleep comfortably tonight...and so will I. Mr. Dukes made sure we had the generator installed the way we wanted it and in a timely manner, smoothing out the bumps along the way. I definitely recommend getting a whole house (Generac) generator and I highly recommend doing business with Mr. Dukes of Baldwin Heating & Air Conditioning. He knows his business and is a man of integrity.

resp.text: Kathy thank you so much. It was a pleasure working with you.

name: Carrie Andrews
text: My  elderly fathers air conditioner went out suddenly and he called Baldwin Heating & Air Conditioning for the first time. When the mechanic arrived he immediatly started in on a sales pitch saying the three year old a/c was not worth repairing due to its age. He wasted over thirty minutes at $100.00 an hour trying to sell us on a new unit  before he even took his tools out of his truck. After one hour into the diagnosis he tells us he needs a part and will return shortly and he leaves. We wait without a/c for over two hours for him to run to get the parts. When he returns he quickly replaces what he calls the capacitor. We had to pay $685.50 for the total repair, $125.00 of which was the part When we were cleaning up his mess we found the reciept from Solar Supply for the part he purchased. That $125.00 part cost them $6.20 , The mechanic also charged us for four pounds of freon and he never even removed the freon caps from the a/c. I feel violated and would not recommend this company to my worst enemy. I will be calling the BBB

name: Judson E Crump
text:
A bit disappointing.  3 months ago, our AC unit wasn't cooling as well as it should.  So we called Baldwin HVAC.  They sent a guy to come out and look at it.  He looked briefly at the unit, walked around the house for a few minutes with a thermometer, and quickly pronounced that there was nothing wrong, and that all we needed was to change our air filters.  So they charged us $39 for the visit (the fee they quote you) plus $50 for "labor," which I guess is that guy's rate for walking around your house for 10 minutes.

Obviously, I keep my filters changed, so I was suspicious, but I assumed that he knew what he was talking about.  2 weeks ago, our AC stops working completely.   Before calling anyone, I go into the attic and check it out myself.  The coils were completely frozen.  And not only that - they were clogged with dust and mold.  This was due to our blower motor malfunctioning, which had been happening slowly for some time at that point.

I took a photo to show how bad it was.  Naturally, I called Baldwin HVAC to ask how their guy missed something so obvious.  The manager, Anthony, said that the initial $89 visit "didn't include" looking at the coils, even though it took me - an ordinary guy with no HVAC expertise - literally 5 minutes to open up the blower and look in there.

Like an fool, I believed him, and so hired them to come out and fix the blower motor that had gone bad.  Their guy John came and he was nice and did a good job.

But the next day, the same AC unit goes dead again.  This time, the problem is the outdoor compressor.  So I call them to come check it out.

They charge us yet another $89 to come and look at the same AC system they'd worked on the very day before.  This time, we resist their high-pressure sales tactics ("It's 4 PM, so if you want the AC working tomorrow, we need to order the part now! ") and call a different company to work on the compressor.  Baldwin HVAC quoted us $822 to replace the part (which was covered by warranty).  We went to Climatemp instead, and they charged us $550 for the exact same job.  They got the part that same day and had a guy out there the very next morning.

Long story short: I'd recommend someone else first, if only because these people charge more than other companies, and in my experience, the quality of the work just wasn't sufficient to justify the extra cost.

text: Outstanding.  Honest and very professional.  They know HVAC systems.

name: Ashley Morrison
text: My air went out. Adam Heating and Cooling helped to restore my air conditioner unit. Kayla was very supportive and helped to confirm my appointment and sent Michael the technician to my home immediately. Michael was very professional and knowledgeable. He was able to identify the problem and fix the issue. Very personable and even suggested other services for future reference. I highly recommend and am in favor of this company's services.

resp.text: Very glad to hear this, Mrs. Wilder! We're happy to have you as a new customer and we hope to see you again in the fall for us to keep that unit running efficiently!

name: Lt Gen George Evans
text: First I want to say this was my first time using this company. I had an extremely knowledgeable technician,  who came out to my home and he was also a Military Veteran. He put on shoe covers and even wore a face mask out of respect for myself and my family. I have met many HVAC technicians over the years, but this one went above and beyond them all. I will be using Adams Heating and Cooling again in the future! Thank you!

resp.text: Thank you for your service! We want all of our customers to feel safe and comfortable from beginning to end. Thank you for leaving a review!

name: Logan Tavel
text: Adams HNC is such a great company to work with. The service technicians are very friendly and informative. They are able to explain my AC unit in a way that I can understand. I feel like I get quality service and a fair price.

resp.text: Thank you for a stellar review, Logan! We are very blessed to have good customers such as yourself.

name: Jennifer Rose
text: They were quick to come out, and very informative. They come across as hardworking and trustworthy. I am pleased with what I’ve seen this company, and highly recommend.

resp.text: Our technicians love to hear that their hard work does not go unnoticed.  Thank you, Ms. Rose!

name: memiddletonjr
text: Used several companies but Adams have been doing a great job for us. They initially came out when we couldn’t get anyone else to help out for several days. They’ve diagnosed some difficult problems and have always gotten them fixed quickly without breaking the bank. Highly recommend them and all the technicians have been great to work with.

resp.text: Continued support from people like yourself is what makes us run. We truly appreciate your business, Mr. Middleton!

name: Mario Bueno
text:
Adams will take care of you!!!

My A/C stopped working while the temperatures were going up, but their knowledgeable group of technicians came in with the goal of helping me, and they did. Thanks to their friendly staff, I had a working unit that same night. This company will go the extra mile to ensure customers are satisfied.

If prompt and friendly response was not enough, quality work is also on the top of their list. The company owner himself inspected the work being done at my house!!

Thank you again Adams for a job well done!!

I would definitely recommend them to anyone.

resp.text: How sweet of you, Mr. Bueno! It’s always our goal to deliver knowledgeable and quality service from start to finish. We are thrilled that you had a great experience with us. Looking forward to working with you in the future!

name: Green Thumb Wannabe
text: Matt, the technician from Adams Heating and Cooling, was thorough, knowledgeable, and helpful. We have an older unit that needed a repair and  unlike other companies, I never felt pressured to replace the unit. He offered solutions for repair and asked if we wanted to know about replacement options. When we opted for repair, he quickly ordered the part and scheduled an appointment to install it. I highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you for such a sweet review! So glad Matt was able to discuss your options with you, and that we were able to get you fixed up.

name: Kelsey Cook
text: The guy that came to see what was causing problems with my AC was very friendly and professional. He explained to me everything he was doing and also answered all of the questions that I had. Would 100% recommend them!

resp.text: Just what we love to hear! Thank you so much for your review, Ms. Cook.

name: Justine Domingo
text: Our air conditioning unit stopped working last night and when I called the company, even though it was only answering service, they were quick enough to give me a call back and come check our system the next day. Service was really good and they make sure that everything is taking care of. Would definitely recommend them to anybody who has air conditioning problem.

resp.text: Glad to hear our answering service was able to get you through to us, and very happy we were able to get you up and running again! Thank you!

name: Kandice Shows
text: Great job. Made sure it was done correctly. Double checked everything. Would definitely recommend

resp.text: Awesome! Glad to have a happy customer!

name: Broderick Washington
text: This was my first experience with Adams Heating and Cooling and I must say that I was extremely impressed!  They came highly recommended from a friend.  I will be using them exclusively for all my HVAC needs!!!

resp.text: Yay for new customers! Welcome to the Adams family, and thank you for giving us the opportunity! We value your business, and greatly appreciate it!

name: Cassandra Clark-Lavender
text: I had another company come to my home and that technician didn't do anything to fix my issue. Instead, he tried to sell me a new unit AND told me he wasn't going to do what was needed to fix my issue. He lost my business.  The young man today went above and beyond to solve the problem and we contacted the next person needed to complete the job. That is what being a professional looks like.  I will definitely use Adams Heating & Cooling again.

resp.text: We always want our customers to feel great about their experience with Adams, and it sounds like Austin did just that. Thank you for the kind words!

name: Alison Tonks
text: I spoke with Autumn to schedule the inspection of several HVAC units as part of a real estate transaction.  She was professional, courteous and  followed up promptly via email to ensure all of my questions regarding the specifics of the inspections were answered.  Jon performed the HVAC inspections.  He provided excellent pictures and explanations of the deficiencies for each of the units.  Jon took the time to discuss his finding via phone in addition to sending detailed reports.  Excellent customer service - highly recommend Adams Heating & Cooling.

resp.text: Wow, what kind words Ms. Tonks! We are so happy we could make this a good experience for you and hope to work with you again in the future :)

name: susan herrington
text: The technician was prompt and thorough. He explained all the work done without me having to ask. I was very pleased with the service. I would recommend Adams Heating & Cooling

resp.text: Happy to hear about your good experience with Matt, Mrs. Herrington!

name: Terry Heverly
text: Blake, the service tech,  changed out a thermostat.  He was very efficient and polite.  He spent time explaining how it worked.  I recommend contacting Adams Heating and cooling if you need that kind of service.

resp.text: We are glad to hear that Blake got your Google Nest changed so that you can enjoy it Mr. Heverly!

name: Sarah Minor
text: We have been using Adam's H&C since we moved into our home nearly 4 years ago. They are friendly, thorough, smart, and reliable. I highly recommend them to anyone. They truly care about your needs and listen to you.

resp.text: Having great customers like yourself is what makes our job worth it. Thank you for being so wonderful!

name: Memorie Gosa
text: My family has used this company for years- they are professional and courteous.  Highly recommend for all HVAC needs.

resp.text: Thank you for continuing to trust us with all your HVAC needs! We appreciate your business!

name: Christian R
text: These guys are great! The quote and scheduling was done professionally and expeditiously. The installation team was courteous, respectful, and paid meticulous detail to the work. It was a refreshing experience to be treated with such great customer service.

resp.text: Thank you, Mr. Rouse! We have a great install group. So glad you had a good experience with us! Enjoy your new unit :)

name: Gorman Houston
text: They came on Saturday night and quickly and thoroughly corrected our AC problem.

resp.text: Alabama heat can be rough! We're happy we had the chance to get you up and running quickly, Mr. Houston :)

name: Jim Kell
text:
The Adams Heating & Cooling installation crew, headed by Austin Nichols arrive on time and did an efficient, thorough job of installing my new Heating and Cooling unit. Austin is a very personable and knowledgeable about his work, wanted to make sure I was pleased. I was.
Thank you

resp.text: So awesome to hear, Mr. Kell! Austin shines at making sure our customers are satisfied. I am glad he was able to answer your questions to make you feel more comfortable about your new unit :)

name: james robertson
text: The  tech who worked  for  Adam's was  great  very  professional and very knowledgeable about the  system in my  home I would recommend  them to  anyone who  needs access service

resp.text: Thank you, Mr. Robertson! Glad to hear Matt was able to get you taken care of, we appreciate your business!

name: Sandy Gathings
text:
Adams continues their high standard of responsive, dependable service with our most recent experience: the purchase and installation of a new HVAC system, along with improved ductwork for more efficient air flow.

Over the past few years we have called upon Adams for various HVAC issues, and have always been pleased with the quality of the work, as well as the courteousness of every employee we have encountered.

Thanks to Adams, we are cool and comfortable now.

resp.text: Thank you for being a valued customer and allowing us to continue to service you! Wonderful customers like you are what keep us going!

name: Darkeya Gulley
text: Matt was very professional and answered all of my questions. We look forward to seeing him in the fall.

resp.text: So glad Matt got your maintenance squared away today! We are looking forward to seeing you when this Alabama weather cools down, Ms. Gulley :)

name: Chris James
text: We called Adams it was 90 degrees outside we had no air conditioning and couldn't sleep they came out quickly and accessed our problem  and told me a price and when they were going to start, they couldn't start right away so they gave us a portable air conditioning system so we would be able to sleep in our house, I highly recommended this company if you need air conditioning service they're the best.

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking your time to share your experience with us, Mr. James! Sometimes units can’t get here due to manufacturing, but we try to keep you comfortable in the meantime. Very glad you had a pleasant experience with us 😊

name: Deborah Anders
text: We used them recently for a repair and were so impressed that we joined their maintenance service. Had to call them out last week for an issue and at their recommendation had a new unit installed this week. Despite the situation (buying a new unit is never fun), the experience was amazing from start to finish: the scheduling process was efficient, the service technicians were knowledgeable and friendly, and the invoicing system was detailed and user friendly. I would definitely recommend them to anyone needing HVAC sales or service!

resp.text: Ms. Anders, thank you for your kind words! We are happy to hear that we made this a pleasant experience for you. Enjoy your new unit!

name: Randy
text: Ontime service tech.  Checked A/C system thoroughly and offered excellent update information.

resp.text: We strive to be punctual to appointments or try our best to update customers when we're running behind schedule. Thank you for the review, Randy!

name: Rusty Allen
text: Their service technicians and installers are knowledgeable, professional, and respectful. The guys work efficiently and clean up after themselves. I will use Adams for future hvac needs and I will recommend them to friends and family.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your business! We strive to give our customers the best service possible. I hope you and Casey enjoy the new unit!

name: lori krauss
text: First of all I called after hours and got someone immediately. They were ready to go to a rental house we own. They stated to save me some money that if they got there and needed a part, they would have to come back in the morning. So basically they saved me some money and their time. I greatly appreciated this! AMAZING customer service and I HIGHLY RECOMMEND them. Do not even bother calling anyone else, save yourself the headache. These guys are not going to waste your time or charge you a fortune.

resp.text: Great review! We ALWAYS put what’s best for the customer FIRST. We want you as a customer for years to come. Thank you for giving us the opportunity to earn your business!

name: Jim Shaw
text: Austin and the crew provided first class service. Very satisfied!!!

resp.text: Very glad to hear this, Mr. Shaw! We thank you for your business.

name: David Branham
text:
It was very great service. They got straight to the problem. I really appreciate Michael getting my unit back working. I highly recommend them to others.
Thanks

resp.text: David, thanks for the great review! Michael is one of our best guys. I'm glad he was able to get your unit running how it should!

name: Andrew Adams
text: Jon came out to give us options on replacing our unit. He was professional and very knowledgeable on the products and solutions that would best fit, not only our budget, but our home we have just purchased. Jon was able to answer all my questions and we have a good insight on what to get. Thanks much!

resp.text: Let us know if you need anything else, be glad to help! Thank you for the review and your business !

name: Autumn Stephens
text: This company came out and redid the AC units on our house and also completed new duct work in our home. All of the technicians I met were courteous, professional, and Michael did a great job at explaining how this upgrade to our home will save us money. My fiancé and I were very impressed with their work. They have even saved us money on our power bill by replacing the duct work and making our units run more efficiently! We will definitely use Adams again in the future.

resp.text: Glad everything is working out how we planned it. It’s always nice feeling comfortable in your home and saving money. Thanks for choosing us to be your service company !

name: Larry Hampton
text: My Air Conditioner and Heat went out on the same day! New here to town I called in to Adams Heating and Cooling and the young man they sent out was named Jon. Jon made me feel as if I had known him all my life. Very courteous and great sense of humor! Jon had both my heat and cooling working in less than no time. I will recommend Adams Heating and Cooling to all my friends and family. God Bless!

resp.text: Great review! I’ll definitely let Jon know how great of a job he did. Thanks!

name: Tiffany Nichols
text: Austin and his crew did an awesome job installing our new AC unit. I will definitely recommend Adams heating and cooling to anyone. Thank you again

resp.text: Hi Mrs. Nichols, we are always happy to hear of a job well done from our guys. Glad we were able to get you cool just in time for this warm weather!

name: Eric Norris
text: Exceptional company! Fast and friendly service! Arrived  when they were scheduled. They called me when they were finished with the installation of our tankless water heater! Which we love! Highly recommend them for all your HVAC and tankless water needs!

resp.text: So glad you and your wife are enjoying the new water heater. A tankless is such a better efficient option and much more convenient to have!

name: Ariel Turner
text: Matt and Austin were some great people and workers! I love their respect and hard work! I would definitely recommend their services to anyone...also, my initial contact, John was very sweet and all were very professional!!! Thank you Adam’s heating and cooling!!!!

resp.text: Ariel, Thank you for your business and kind words! I’ll let the guys know how great they did. Fill free to call anytime, if you have questions about your new system   Also, don’t forget to call and sign up for our maintenance. You want to keep that new system clean and running efficiently for years to come!!

name: Glenda Johnson
text: I could not have ask for a nicer group of guy's to come to my house for an installation  of any kind.  They were friendly,  open to questions and were honest  in there answers. Knew what to to and finished the job well.

resp.text: We think highly of our employees. They are always motivated to get the job done, and do it the right way! We value your business Ms. Johnson, enjoy your new unit!

name: Chad Allen
text: ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ For the high caliber young man that was able to answer my questions when I called in about my thermostat not working properly. Jon walked me through reprogramming my nest thermostat that I tried to install and the heat cut right on. Its nice to know that you can call anytime and they will answer any questions you may have about your system!

resp.text: We are glad we could help you out. Here at Adams, we always love helping out customers. Thank you for review !

name: Tony Elmore
text: Called and talked to Michael about the operation of our new heat pump system. He was very helpful and patient in explaining in full detail how our system and how it works. I have been doing business with this company for many years and have always been nothing but the best in service and attention to our needs. As far as I'm concerned they are the best hands down .

resp.text: Thank you, Tony! Glad we could finally move the unit off the back porch. We have been talking about it for a while. Enjoy the quietness. Appreciate the review.

name: Bill Jackson
text: When my Heat/AC is not working, I always know just who to call. Adams Heating and Cooling has been taking care of my unit for years. Jon has came to my home over the last couple of years and kept my unit running great! My power bill hasn’t budged since the initial install years ago. If you haven’t given these guys a shot to service your AC, you are missing out. Thanks again Adams!

resp.text: Bill, always been a pleasure working for you! Thank you for the great review and your business !

name: Kristie Williams
text: I used adams for my gas fireplace ,my husband called and made a appointment to get someone to come out and look at it. My husband told the despatcher what we needed. When they got here and let me add they were not friendly at all. I was told they just clean fire place they don't repair and maintenance, so I just payed the 79 dollers fee and they left. My husband called back to ask why did they tell him they didn't repair gas fire places ,the lady stated the girl was new and she didn't now answered the phone. And one of the guys stated it's gonna get hot soon anyway , I don't care how hot I want my fire place fixed.i will never use them again , I wouldn't recommend them to anyone else.

resp.text: Ms. Williams, we are so sorry about the misunderstanding that you went through. We have discussed this situation with the technicians so that this does not happen again. As I told your husband over the phone earlier, we would be happy for Richard, the owner, to come out personally to handle this for you so that we can make this right! If you do reconsider for us to do so, please give us a call at 205-339-6540 so that we may get this taken care of.

name: Don Bailey
text: Adams provides top notch service.  Our technician today, Harrison, was very diligent to examine every detail of the ac system and get everything right.  Our system is performing better than ever.  It is a pleasure to have clean, efficient, and pleasant service now of days. And, everything was cleaned up and left in excellent shape.  Thank you, Adams and Harrison!

resp.text: Don, it has always been a great pleasure servicing you and your family! Thank you for the great review!!

name: Crystal Hulskotter
text: Stephen was wonderful. Answered all of our questions and helped with everything we needed. Very professional. Would definitely recommend.

resp.text: Thank you, Crystal! Appreciate you taking the time to leave a review! Glad we was able to get you up an running quickly.

name: Rebecca Parris
text: They did an awesome job we also had a tankless water heater installed great work!!!

resp.text: We are glad we were able to get your water heater upgraded to a more efficient one. Looking forward to hearing how much you have saved on your power bill with your new tankless :)

name: Lawrence Clayton
text:
Stephen (Steven) very professional, knew his work, and a very likable young man. Good rep for your business!
Larry Clayton

resp.text: Stephen is one of our best guys, I’ll definitely pass on the kind words. Thanks for your business !

name: Tony Holland
text: My AC went out last week and I had Jon come out and he immediately found the issue, offered reasonable solutions and had the AC up and going in what seemed like minutes. I have had several companies out before that have tried to fixed the problem, but they could not get it resolved. I am very grateful to have had a technician of his caliber come out. We will use Adams Heating and Cooling for now on! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

resp.text: Jon is one of our best guys, glad he was able to get you up and running quickly. That is always our goal. Thanks for choosing us to come out!

name: Bradshaw Tony
text: Great service by matt...very pleased

resp.text: Glad Matt was able to get you fixed up Mr. Bradshaw!

name: Mary Ball
text: Jon was very professional and well mannered. Outstanding job! 10/10

resp.text: Love it! Definitely passing this along. Thank you for your business and this great review!

name: Nikki Hill
text: Everything about our experience was exceptional, but the knowledgeable, professional, and prompt staff deserve special recognition. Whether it was in scheduling a visit, discussing the estimate of the work we wanted, or the wonderful service men who came to install our new unit, we were constantly impressed with the way everyone was truly dedicated to doing an outstanding job. Hands down, Adams Heating and Cooling is the best company we've ever done business with, and we won't be using anyone else!

resp.text: Thank you for such a great review!!! I actually came by to give, Stephen and Blake, material to finish the job. Apologies for not introducing myself! I was running behind on some other calls. Beautiful house BTW! Hope you enjoy your new mini split! Thank you for your business!!

name: George Ray
text: They never called back. Guess my money wasnt green enough

resp.text: George, sorry about the misunderstanding, we called you back with no response. We don’t work on RV’s. Sorry we couldn’t help. We appreciate your call though!

name: Jon A
text: I had Adams Heating and Cooling out last week, the technician Jon came out and discussed my issues with me and the solutions to fix it. He was prompt, courteous, and even took his shoes off at the door! He was able to fix my issues and it is working a hundred times better than before. I recommend Adams to everyone i know! Thank you for a job well done Adams!

resp.text: Thank you for the great review! We really appreciate you choosing us to service your home!!

name: Sonya McCollum
text: Michael Bridges, was the technician that was sent to my home from Adam's Heating & Cooling today. I couldn't have asked for a better respectful young man. He was professional, knowledgeable, and understanding to my family's situation. I was also able to purchase a new thermostat for my home from him. Within little to no time, my new thermostat was installed. Michael then showed and explained to me how it worked and informed  me if I ever have any problems, not to hesitate and give the company a call. I was referred to give this company by the Savages. I most definitely see why. I, myself will highly recommend Adam's Heating and Cooling to others. This company's professionalism even goes back to when I first spoke with Savannah when I first made the initial call. She was very patient with me because it took me a minute to figure out when they could come and check out my unit. Overall, I would give them a 10. Thanks Adam's Heating and Cooling!!!

resp.text: What a great review!! We appreciate you letting us service your home! Tell the Savages Thank You for us! Great people!

name: Erek Branch
text: Great service.

resp.text: Thank you for the review Mr. Branch! Please give us a call at 205-339-6540 to let us know what we can do to get that 4 star review to a 5 star.

name: Michael Poe
text: They did an entire system for me. Very professional and now thank goodness I’m cool... would highly recommend!

resp.text: You choose a great system! Going to save you a lot of money on your power bills and feel more comfortable than ever before. Enjoy! Thank you for the great review!

name: Chris Brooks
text: Wonderful experience !!!! I have used them over the past six years and just had them replace my first floor HVAC system. I am having  them do the upstairs next year. The staff is very polite and knowledgeable. They are also very quick to respond. Prices are reasonable and I feel like the value is there. I like that this is a local business and that the owner is involved every step of the way. He even personally came to the house to inspect while the work was being done .  It’s very rare to see that type of customer service today. I highly recommend using them !!!!  Thank you to everyone at Adams !!!!!

resp.text: So glad we could help y’all out! That back porch is going to be a lot more enjoyable now!! As always, Thank you for your business!!!

name: Archie Weaver
text: The best in the city, hands down.  I had an estimate on the work the day I called.  They were at my house within 2 days and the work completed in 2 days.   It was extensive work but the team was there at 8:30 each day to get it done.  They are very technologically advanced and I appreciate that.  They send a text with a picture of the employee who is on his way so you know who is coming.  I highly recommend Adams.

resp.text: Thanks Archie! Appreciate the great review!! Appreciate your business!

name: Kimberly King
text: Matt and Adam made sure the ac system was set up properly plus they returned the next day after removing the old system to make sure everything was properly working.

resp.text: We take pride in making sure the job is done correctly and the customer is happy with the job. Glad the guys did a good job. Thank you for your business and a great review!

name: Melissa Patton
text: Technician Michael came out today to service our a/c unit. He was very professional and kind. He seemed very knowledgeable and answered all questions. We called at lunch time and he was here by 330, exactly when they said he would be here. We also received a text with his picture so we knew who would be coming! would recommend this company to everyone!

resp.text: Appreciate the great review! That is something we really try to accomplish here. Give our techs enough time to make it to each call on time. We know your time is valuable. Don’t have time to waste waiting on us. Also, with times now, you need to know who is coming to your door. That’s a must! Thank you again!

name: W B
text: Professional from beginning to end of service. Starting with the  young lady who took my call to the young men who serviced my unit...HIGHLY RECOMMEND.

name: Larry Myers
text: I have found Adams Heating & Cooling to be the most knowledgeable and professional HVAC company in Tuscaloosa. They have solved all of my HVAC problems that other companies could not even identify. All of their employees have consistently provided excellent service. In comparison to other HVAC companies in Tuscaloosa, Adams HVAC truly cares about their customers and they will go the extra mile to help improve your home environment. Five-Star service each and every time! Give them a call whenever you need HVAC service.

resp.text: It’s truly been a pleasure working for you! We came in under tough circumstances , trying to fix issues left behind by other companies. Wasn’t easy but we finally achieved it. Looking forward to many more years servicing you and your family. Thank you for trusting us with your home!

name: Tish Savage
text: My husband & I started with Richard Adams back in 2014 for our hot water heater. He's a great guy with great workers & office staff. We have received professionalism, good prices & excellent service. I have referred several people to Adams Heating & Cooling. We are very pleased with them.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review!! Always been a pleasure serving you and your family!

name: Karen Nicholson
text: Excellent service.

resp.text: We love to hear it! Thank you!

name: Sean Ryan
text: These guys did a great job installing a new HVAC system!

resp.text: You picked a great system, you’ll enjoy the multi stage heating and cooling with constant air flow through the whole house. Comfort!! We really appreciate your business! Thank you!

text: These guys are great. Always professional!  I'd highly recommend this company. resp.text: We appreciate your business! Thank you!

text: Best dang company there is! Dylan, Matt, and Harrison changed out my system quickly and had snow balls blowing out the registers in no time! text: My Air conditioner went out and I knew exactly who to call. Adams Heating and Cooling! I had  Jon come out. He was very courteous and on time! resp.text: Glad Jon was able to find and fix your problem! We make it a point to get the customer involved in finding the problem and understanding it! Sets us apart! Thank you for a great review!

name: Adam Carver
text: Great Job!

name: William Sullivan
text: They were very efficient from the time I made the appointment until the time the tech Jon arrived. They sent reminder text every day of my appointment. Never had an AC company do that before. Jon the tech was very nice & professional. Would highly recommend.

name: Cortney Palmer Patton
text:
We had the best all around experience with Adam's! From the moment we called them, they were able to help us immediately resolve our ac not working temporarily. The entire Adam's Heating and Cooling Staff went above and beyond to help us as much as possible. We are extremely grateful for this wonderful experience and more so thankful for Adam's Heating and Cooling.
Thank you all for your help and time, over the years!!!
God Bless You All,
Cortney and Drew Patton

name: Annie Klassen
text:
First, Recently moved to Tuscaloosa and hired this company based on their good reviews.
I would not hire this company. Just called for tune up and they said I needed repairs totaling $800 including parts...on a new unit. I’m a female who does her homework, called a reputable company to check. After their inspection, they said there was no mechanical issues. They put in 2lbs of Freon because someone hadn’t capped it.  They also mentioned they no one from Adams even took the cover off the unit, which I can attest to because I was standing there, but know nothing about HVAC. Buyer beware.

resp.text: Sorry about your experience in using us! My technicians are very well trained to check over your system and look for any problems with your system. If you had to add 2 lbs of refrigerant to your system, then you have a leak that wouldn't be fixed by simply caps. That is just a short term solution to your problem. We offered the long term fix for around $500, not $800. If the parts weren't under warranty would of cost you over $1500 to repair properly. Unfortunately, Newer units fail all the time. Thank you for giving us the opportunity to earn your business!

resp.text: Unfortunately, after the first year, Manufacturers don't pay any labor or material to put the parts in that they give us under warranty. That cost goes to the customer. Some distributors even charge us a fee to fill the warranty with them. Which is pretty unfair too. I wish it was different. Sorry! We really appreciate your Business!! I hope this one thing doesn't change from you using us again. We really try to be honest and fair!

text: Cannot say enough positive things about this company! Our air went on the fritz 2 weeks ago due to a bad freon leak. Richard came out same day  to check on the issue and gave us our options. Richard came out and filled our unit with freon to get us through the baby shower and then they began work the next week installing a complete new unit, furnace and duct work. They are VERY ACCOMMODATING with schedules, and they communicate often and effectively. We know nothing about heating and cooling lingo and what's good and what's bad, and their crew explained everything they were going to do and why. Adams is trustworthy, and their work is honest, cost efficient, and clean as can be. They even swept and vacuumed after they finished each day!

resp.text: Sorry for the delay to respond to this. I couldn't tell you how great it is to have someone leave such a great review! I really do take pride over customer service. I feel like it is going away more and more. We try to hold a standard here. I preach it everyday! Thank you again for this review! This is why we are in business. To help people.

text: I was given an estimate to replace the inside and outside unit, as well as all ductwork. What I actually needed was just the outside unit and repair the existing ductwork. resp.text: Sorry you feel it was a waste of time! With new refrigerant, we can't just replace the outside unit anymore. With the duct work, must of been a lot more issues than what you thought you had. More than 50% of existing homes  have improperly sized duct work. Which could be the cause of your outside unit being bad. We don’t look for the temporary fix but the permanent one. There was issues we saw that suggested replacing the duct and system to get your home properly heating and cooling. Thank you for the chance to earn your business!

text:
All Seasons came to our house to fix our air conditioner. On the phone, they explained that the cost for having someone come out would be $70. He did not say that it was $70 per hour. It was obvious he was not familiar with our brand of air conditioner, but instead of saying that from the beginning he continued to stay and look as though he was doing work.

After that, we called another company to come out. They quickly detected that we needed a new fan, went and picked up the part, and installed it within a few hours. It cost us $60. We felt that All Seasons was dishonest in their price and also less qualified than the other company. We were extremely displeased with our service with All Seasons and will not be using them again in the future.

name: J K
text:
I needed to get my air conditioning system repaired.  So I called several HVAC companies, and I quickly found out that the repair cost was high enough that I was better off getting a new air conditioning system. So I did some research, and then I got quotes from 11 different companies. Of the price range of quotes, Xcalibur was among the lowest. So I chose Xcalibur, and the next morning, Ryan, Mark, Jacob and Zachary showed up and installed a new air conditioning system and furnace (I actually didn't need a new furnace, but the extra cost to add a new furnace to the a/c installation job was low.).  The installation guys were professional (for example, they put on shoe covers before entering my house) and knowledgeable.

I'm glad that I chose this company. First, Ben and Ryan are actually honest people. Also, Ben and his employees seem to take pride in doing a good job.  My new a/c system not only comes with the standard 10 year warranty for parts, but also a 10 year warranty for LABOR.  Call other HVAC companies yourself and ask if they include a 10 year labor warranty on a/c installations.  When they say no, ask them what the labor cost is to replace a compressor or an evaporator coil.  Also, Xcalibur installed new line sets with my a/c system. But some HVAC companies cut corners by not installing new line sets.

Since Alabama Power is my electricity company, I can track my electricity usage via Alabama Power's website or their app. My new Bryant a/c system uses about 39% less kilowatts than the American Standard system that it replaced.  In just the first month of using this Bryant a/c system, I saved over $100 on my Alabama Power bill!  I also found out that Bryant equipment and Carrier equipment come out of the same factories because they are sister companies.

If I could give Xcalibur 6 stars, I would. But Google only allows me to give 5 stars.

name: Tim Walker
text:
I always research before I make a big purchase.
My neighbor used Excalibur after getting 5 other quotes so I gave the owner a call. The whole team was friendly and professional. Other companies told me it would be weeks before they could get to me. I had a quote within hours of calling them and a full install in a few days. I really feel good about the work that was done, the product (Bryant) and the price I was quoted. Will definitely use them for future hvac service.

text: Had a heat pump not cooling. Replaced 17 year old outdoor unit the very next day. Prompt and professional.

name: Kyle Schwab
text: I dealt with Emily (office), Brian (Manager), Nic (Sales), Layne (Service), Brian and Kenneth (Installers) on this job and it felt like I had the support from the entire company.  Everyone involved in my transaction was incredible and helped me answer all 10,000 questions and concerns I had.  (No way was I an easy customer on this one.). Everyone was incredibly responsive and always on time or even early.  I had a new 5 ton Trane system installed along with a electronic air Cleaning system with a UV lamp, ionizer, and electronic filter system.  Xcalibur was not the cheapest but also not the most expensive.  This team and product was worth every penny spent.  I highly recommend you letting them check out your needs.

name: Carla Jean Whitley
text:
I initially scheduled a dryer duct cleaning with another company. When the tech didn't show and the company couldn't tell me what happened, I hopped on Nextdoor for recommendations. Ben Kayatta and his team came highly recommended, so I submitted an appointment request through the website. This was on a Friday afternoon. By Saturday morning, I had an email from Ben that said he emailed, rather than called, to avoid disrupting my Saturday morning, but that he was available to schedule my service when I was ready. He made my appointment for Tuesday morning, only two business days later.

As promised, the technician, Zack, called before he headed my way. He arrived at the promised time and was just as efficient throughout the appointment. Zack showed me where my dryer duct ran to and explained what he was going to do. The vent hose on my machine was much longer than necessary, so he offered to trim it to reduce the possibility of it getting bunched up and causing additional issues. Zack was finished within an hour of his arrival and happy to answer my questions.

Xcalibur is fairly priced and competent. I will call Ben and his crew again.

name: Michelle Thompson
text: Nic was friendly and professional! Completed work in great time! He explained things on a level I understood and kept me appraised of the situation!

name: Matt Simmons
text: Nic was very professional and took the time to answer all of our questions. I would highly recommend him and Xcabur Services.

name: David Simmons
text: Excellent service, I am a customer for life now

resp.text: Thanks David,  It was our pleasure and an honor to be able to serve you.

name: Otis Bragg
text: My heat system ,was not working properly ...the technician check it and said I need a new unit ...the price the salesperson quoted was ridiculous high ask them if they had anything else .....

resp.text: Mr. Bragg,  I'm sorry you feel that way.  We always try to serve at the highest level.  I know I have personally spent about an hour on the phone with you trying to figure out a plan for us to move forward with your project.  It is my understanding that you haven't even received another quote for the scope of work you have requested.   I ask you to get a couple estimates from highly rated companies in the area.  I can assure you that was a good and fair price for the scope of work you were requesting.   At no time during any of our conversations did you ever share that we were not taking good care of you.  So I am a little shocked by your low rating.  In fact you stated that you really wanted to do business with us you just needed us to come down in price and i explained that we had come down as far as we could.  I am always available to talk to have my direct phone number.

name: Pamela Ware
text: Gave a time for 8 am and was there at 8am love the service I just love them  thanks for everything

He always calls to let me know he is on the way and when he does he even offers to bring me a coffee, soda or a snack on his way to my house. Nick represents represents Xcalibur well and I cannot say enough good things about him. Thanks again. Lord bless!
In Christ
Matt Aernie

name: Herbert Young
text: The price was extremely high.

resp.text:
Mr. Young, I am sorry that we weren't able to help you with your project this morning.  We are also sorry you didn't like the upfront pricing we provided.  We are fully licensed, insured, bonded, we are a well established full service contractor that offers 100% satisfaction guarantee along with 5 year warranty on all repairs.  We also know that our pricing is competitive if not lower than all of the other full service competitors in the area.  Please reach out to me at 205-718-8688. I would love to discuss further.
Ben-Owner, Xcalibur Services

name: TC Phillips
text:
Let me tell you - if you're having HVAC issues - these are the folks you want to deal with!  Kelly Cleghorn and his techs are the best! Not only did they provide the most comprehensive evaluation and options for repair or replacement - their prices were much lower than the four other estimates I received. I called all of the other big players in the Anniston/Oxford/Jacksonville area and I knew these were the right folks to fix the problem. They even came back out after fixing my HVAC system and helped me install a thermostat free of charge. They are very honest and knowledgeable and give you facts before you make a decision.

This is a Veteran owned business and I support our Veterans both in business and any other way I can, so it was a perfect fit for me.

My current unit may last for a few more years, but when I need a new one, I know exactly who to call!

name: Spencer Crews
text:
Highly recommend!! Bob and his techs are super professional. Timely response to come out and look at out system. We realized we need a while new system in our new home. The techs, Jason and Zach, were amazing. They went above and beyond. Our little family greatly appreciates you and all your hard work!
Keep up the fantastic work!

name: andy rajek
text: Had to have inside unit replaced a couple weeks ago through home warranty with Old Republic. Both companies were great, but Anchor Air went above and beyond. Today, my grandkids came over and the a/c quit working.  Jason, the on call service tech, came out at 10:00. On a Friday night.....after trying to help me figure it out over several phone calls. Great people and company.

name: James Davis
text: After a long move from California,  our new Alabama home needed two HVAC systems replaced.  My wife and I shopped around with several companies and decided on Anchor Air.  That has been one of the best decisions we've made since arriving here in Gulf Shores.  The service we received and installation was outstanding.  The entire team was very professional, on time and went the absolute extra mile to make sure we were taken care of.  If you are searching for a solid company to install and take care of your HVAC needs, stop searching and just call them up.   I can't say enough good things about them...but I will sum it up to say they are Truly exceptional!  Thanks you guys...

name: Ginger Harrison
text: Steven was great!  Very professional,  explained everything to me and did a great job!  Thank you so much!  I really appreciate you coming to fix my air in the evening hours!  I was sent a text when he was on his way along with his picture.   I felt very safe using them.  I would recommend this business and I will use them again!

name: Michael Nassar
text: One of the biggest decisions I've had to make in quite some time was to purchase a new heating and air conditioning system. I chose Anchor Air here in Foley, and I'm so glad I did. I would like to thank the entire Anchor Air team for their exceptional service. I would like to thank Bob, the owner, for his great care and generosity. Bob truly went the extra mile to make me happy and to make everything just right. I would also like to thank Jason for always being so good-natured, patient and happy to answer all of my questions. Robert was also very helpful. Jason, Robert, Andy and their entire team did everything with great skill and precision. This is a hardworking group of people, and they are all polite and professional. Thanks also to Michelle and Brook for cheerfully arranging each appointment. I recommend Anchor Air most highly.

name: Windy Holder
text: Recently bought a brand new unit from Anchor Air and had it installed by Jason and Steve. These two guys are the best. If you are looking for an AC company I highly recommend Anchor Air! text: We are very happy with Anchor Air’s service, and continue to praise Steven Bowman, he is very much appreciated.

resp.text: We are here to help anytime, day, night, and weekends. Thank you for allowing us to serve you and thank you for this great rating!

text: My technician was timely, pleasant and competent, and the people in the office are pleasant and helpful.

name: Steve Tuttle
text: Wow.  I called late in the evening when my air went out.  Jason answered and walked me thru a possible fix.  I didn't have all the tools at my disposal but what he walked me thru was enough for us to stay cool thru the night.  I scheduled a service call for the next day and he arrived on time.  He was very polite, professional, walked me thru everything he did, and gave maintenance suggestions to help avoid my issue in the future.  This type of business model has been lost by most businesses.  Upfront, Honest, Helpful.  An outstanding concept of informing the customer of options and help without trying to gouge the customer for every dime.  Based on this model, you can bet they will be the first company I call when I need a replacement or any service.   Based on my experience, Don't hesitate to call these guys.

text:
Great service, very prompt, good prices, and the best communication of any company in the country!

name: Troy Cook
text: The technician was very friendly and professional.  The only down side was that he did not have any kind of mask to wear.  Any service provider should anticipate the need to wear a mask when serving high risk customers.  This would have easily been a five start review, if he had a mask to wear.  I wore a N95 mask during his service call.  The risk of transmission would have been lower if we both had worn masks.

resp.text: Thank you for your review Troy! Our number one objective is our customers comfort and safety so thank you for bringing this to my attention. We provide all our technicians with masks and I can assure you they will be wearing one for you at our next visit. Merry Christmas!!

text: My air conditioning stopped working during one of the hottest days this spring. I was recommended this company from a very close friend of the owners family. I had to use the after hours service which had an up charge, but it wasn’t that significant. Being a single female, I always wonder if services try to get me to pay more because they think I don’t know what is going on, but my technician was very upfront about what was wrong with my AC unit and even told me to call back the next day during normal business hours to make an appointment to put a new thermostat in (something optional I wanted) to avoid being charged extra. Very trustworthy technician and company. I will be utilizing this company for any AC/heating issues in the future and will be recommending it to my friends.

name: Therese Culliton
text: The service technician that came out the day before we had to have a new unit put in was extremely professional and took the time to explain what was going on with our current system and why it needed to be replaced.  I never felt that he was rushing us as he was very patient and wanted to make sure everything was explained very well.  He went further to explain that the next day they would arrive with the new unit at a certain time.  At that time, he and two other techs arrived and removed the other system again further explaining every step.  Once the new unit arrived, I was told that a Quality Control person would also be coming to inspect what was going on!  I was so impressed with this and had not seen this before.  The Quality Control guy went top to bottom over this entire unit throughout the installation process.  The professionalism of the three techs and the Quality Control man was absolutely first rate!  I will highly recommend this Company to all my friends and coworkers.  After all was said and done, I felt like I was the most important customer they had had that day.  Thanks, again, to all of you for an incredible experience!

resp.text: Therese, it was our pleasure to take care of your heating & cooling needs! We certainly appreciate your business. Thanks again...

name: Tim Caudill
text:
After suffering a power outage late Saturday night, we woke on Sunday morning to a dead heat pump. I called Turner and Schoel expecting either a "Our office hours are Monday through Friday" or "Please leave a message". Instead, I was greeted with an answering service that took my information and said a technician would contact me shortly. Within 20 minutes I received a call. ON A SUNDAY!!!! The technician asked me a few questions and said he would be at my home shortly. ON A SUNDAY!!!!
The technician, Jordan Cribb, arrived within the hour. He went about diagnosing and repairing my unit while keeping me informed of everything he was doing. While here, he was very courteous and professional and I couldn't have asked for a better service technician.

This was my first experience with Turner and Schoel, but it will not be my last. They just made a me a customer for life.

resp.text: Mr. Caudill, thank you for these kind words. We are thankful for all our customers and love showing off our service to “first timers “. We appreciate your business! Glad to be there for you.
