name: BlacKnight 1
text:
Great HVAC company! The owner, Shane, is very personable and the kind of guy you can trust with your door unlocked. Opie (dead ringer for a younger Ron Howard), his technician, is a relatively young guy (23), but mature beyond his years and a very good HVAC tech. He's also trustworthy and the kind of guy you would want to represent your company. Most importantly, he was able to diagnose my heat pump problem quickly and efficiently...10 to 15 minutes. The HVAC was over amped.

The company that installed my TRANE XL14 heat pump in 2007, Alabama Climate Control (ACC) of Huntsville, apparently did not notice that the heat pump was rated for max amperage of 40 amps because they did not bother to change the 50 amp circuit breaker in the panel in the garage. One would expect a professional HVAC company to do a basic electrical circuit check/test to ensure the electrical circuit is compatible with your NEW heat pump...right!?!?

Anyway, this oversight by ACC resulted in a fried circuit breaker in the junction box at the heat pump. Opie said we were lucky this situation did not result in a burned up motor or worse a burned down house. After all that, Opie tried to give me a $25 discount because I'm a veteran.

Thank you for the sentiment Opie, but also thank you for identifying a problem that has caused me great anguish over the years. I had to replace 3 or 4 compressors on the original heat pump (a Rheem) about 15 years ago when we first started renting out the house.

The HVAC company (same ACC) kept replacing all those compressors under warranty at $250 to $300 a pop for labor, but just couldn't figure out what was causing all those compressors to burn up (the same 50 amp circuit breaker in the breaker box). Then, I was dumb enough to hire them again to install a new TRANE in 2007. Remeber, the TRANE is rated for a maximum of 40 amps, but ACC left the same old 50 amp circuit breaker in the breaker panel. Voila...we get a fried junction box this time.

Incredible...that it took a young 23 year old tech with a lot less experience (but more common sense and intelligence) to recognize that a 50 amp circuit breaker is going to eventually cause some problems if it is not compatible with the rest of the circuit.

The cautionary tale here is...be extremely vigilant and careful about who you let work on your electrical systems and watch them like a hawk when they do...until you find a company like SMS that has techs like Opie.. Thank you SMS and Opie for saving my house from a potential fire.

name: Rocker Properties
text: I've been doing business with this company for almost 4 years.  I receive an email every Monday asking if we have any reclaimed refrigerant for pickup.  I respond yes to the email and we never received the pick up.   My office manager calls later in the week to get a pick up, they never come.  I call to get a pick up, a week later, and they never come.  I call again this morning and I get a lecture on how we don't spend enough money with them.   Then they call the office and list the amount of money we spent with them over the last 4 years.  Completely unprofessional.   DO NOT do business with this company.  All they want to sell you is a R-22 drop-in refrigerant called 421A.  Don't do it.  It's snake oil and it doesn't work.  Trust me, we tried it.....

resp.text: We are very sorry to hear of your unsatisfactory experience. We strive to make sure that every customer we have feels very taken care of. We would LOVE the opportunity to make this right for you. Please contact us (as we don't have your information) and we will gladly make this right!

name: Jason King
text: When I purchased my house 10 years ago the unit was already installed by absolute air. I did my research and called them for a service on the unit. Now that the unit is getting older I'm trying to milk every year I can out of it. The house was not cooling so I called them and they came out today ...unit is in good shape. They cleaned the coils and checked everything out. Come to find out one of the branch ducts had come aloose and cool air was going under the house ....this was fixed and it's getting cooler now as I type. We keep the house cold like 65 degrees during the hot summer months. We work outside and it's always nice to come home to a cool house. Thanks to the tech that came out he was awesome.

text: Absolute Air is always on time and does a great job!  They have fixed my AC’s in several locations and even installed new ones.  They have also installed a ductless unit in my house and a hot water heater.  Highly recommend!

text: This is my second great experience with this company! The first time around, I asked them to give me a second opinion after being told I needed a whole new system by someone else. They told me I did not need a new system, and made a repair that cost maybe $100 instead of the thousands I would have spent otherwise. This time, one of their techs, Noah, was able to solve a strange problem I was having with my thermostat not reading correctly even though it was functioning fine, and the system was functioning fine—something no one else has been able to solve. (Let's just say it was actually an insulation issue, not an HVAC issue. But he still fixed it.) I'm thankful for their trustworthiness because that can be hard to find. Would absolutely recommend them to everyone I know.

text: Our 14 year old Trane AC died a week ago. After getting a quote from a well known 5⭐️ company in Birmingham, I had sticker shock at the replacement cost for a unit that was not near the quality of a Trane and a downgrade compared to my current specs. A friend recommended Chris Kelley at Absolute Air. What a lifesaver. He arrived within two hours after my call. He quoted me an American Standard (maker of Trane) that significantly upgraded my current seer rating and added a variable speed versus single stage unit. His price cremated the previous company’s quote with a superior product and upgrade. Unit was installed less than 48 hours later. Excellent service techs that were polite and so helpful. I don’t think I have ever been so impressed with an HVAC company. Thank you Chris.

text: Excellent service!!!  I would recommend this company to anyone who wants quality work at fair prices.

name: Gilbert Nicholson
text:
Johnny Rich is a great guy - one of the nicest fellows you'll run across in the HVAC community in Birmingham. But he's not reliable.

He had already been to my house on a couple of calls over the last couple of years, and did a great job. Back in October, I left him a voice mail on his cell phone to check my HVAC unit. No reply.

A few days later I texted him, and got a return text he would get back to me later. I never heard from him.

His voice mail says call his office for immediate help. I then left a message with a woman who answered the phone, who i assume was his secretary. She said she would pass the message on to him and he would call to set up an appointment. I never heard from him. In my book, three strikes and you're out.

I have no idea why he didn't want the business. But even if I had been a new customer, if he didn't want the business, or was too busy and didn't have time, you would think he would have the professional courtesy to call and say he was too busy. Or call back and say something.

I called Norrell, who was recommended by some friends. They responded immediately and fixed the problem at a reasonable rate. I won't be calling Absolute Air again.

He was able to work with us on our insurance claim and he even installed the new unit while we were gone on vacation. I would recommend this business to anyone and everyone and he will be my go to for all AC needs. He has great customer service and made such a stressful situation 1000000% better.

text: Very professional. Super fast. Good prices!!! He is super nice and very efficient! I can not say good enough things about this company. I would recommend him for any of your heating and air needs.

name: Michael Albarram
text: Great service at a reasonable price and fast called in the morning he was there that afternoon

name: Amanda Lowe
text: Awesome job!! Very affordable and the guy is super nice!

name: Daniel Bradley
text: Great AC Technican!! Highly recommend!

name: Jason Garner
text: Mike came to our house quickly on a Saturday morning and solved our problem quickly and didn't try to convince us it was something worse than it was to get a more profitable house call will definitely use Harvest Heating and Air Conditioning for our HVAC needs.

name: lavena smith
text: Michael was awesome!!!! Found my problem in less than 10 minutes!!! Soooo happy with his performance!

name: Love Abrams
text: Good business

name: Mary McKinnon
text:
The entire staff has been helpful and professional! Thank you Gary, Carla and Katie for your information and guidance. Gary went out of his way to accommodate our crazy schedule. He is so knowledgeable.
Mason, Jaq and Clay arrived on time, they were professional and informative. The work was done in a timely manner, very neat and clean with attention to detail. When they were done, there was not a spec of anything left. Thank you for a job so well done!

name: Katie Willis
text: I have been using Total Comfort for about 3 years. They have always exceeded my expectations. I highly recommend this company for your heating and air needs.

name: M Tyree Wilson
text: From the initial PHONE CALL TO THE FINAL "FIST BUMP" AFTER THE INSTALL....We knew we made the right decision going with this company...The rep we set up the appointment with....EXCELLENT...The guy(Gary) that came out to do the estimate....EXCELLENT and HONEST ....The guys who performed the Install....you guessed it EXCELLENT !!!!!!  My family and I are very pleased with everything that was presented and performed....couldn't  ask for better service...Total Comfort Heating and Air is the TOTAL PACKAGE of Honesty, Service, and Professionalism ....

name: C Mallory
text: This was my first time using this company, but it definitely will not be my last. I called on a Saturday when my furnace went out, which was actually beyond repair and had to be replaced. They were very polite and courteous and I am well pleased with my new furnace.

name: kristy templeton
text: Great place. Harry is the best

name: Sylvia N.
text: Total Comfort Heating and Air is an excellent company, fully committed in delivering the absolute best service to its customer base.  The HVAC technicians are highly knowledgeable and very professional.  They  efficiently get your home back to the right temperature at a reasonable cost.  Chelsea, in the office, schedules appointments with the lowest wait time.  Harry, the service manager, is responsive to individual customer's needs and intends to exceed their expectations.  Big hearts all around with these people!  I wish other companies were this sincere in pleasing the public.

name: Ambera Law
text:
Total Comfort Heating & Air, they came out Saturday my system had frozen-up, water was leaking into the room below. .I was told me what to do over the week-end, they said they would return on Monday.
They came that Monday morning and did everything they said I needed and extra work to get my system up and working in a timely manner.  Total Comfort Heatimg & Air is a great company.  They stand on you word Thank God for a company like theirs.

name: Mrs Johnson
text: I have to say that the one person I spoke with was very polite and professional. I called their office and Mrs. Danielle pick up with a very polite and professional voice. I have several questions and she didn’t hesitate to answer any of them. I could tell she was very busy as she did have to ask me to be put on hold a few times,( which wasn’t a problem)  but each time she came back she would always apologize and make sure she helped me in any way she could. With everything going on in our world this is someone you would enjoy talking too. This to me is how you would want your fore front of your business to be. I will have no problem recommending this company or recommending Danielle to anyone.

name: Taylor Stinson
text: Landon and Justin who did our install were awesome. Really professional and knowledgeable about what they were doing. Cleaned up their area after finishing.

name: Kekke Young
text: Brett was our technician. He was very knowledgeable and efficient. He answered all of our questions.

name: Kamren P
text: I would definitely recommend this company . I called on Sat morning around 5am & someone was able to come out around 9am I only had to pay $50 for them to come out , which was awesome considering that it's the weekend . Some other companies charge a much higher fee to come out on a Sat . My technician was Tyler . He was excellent! As a woman , he made me feel very comfortable. He explained the situation clearly and informed me of my options . I didn't feel pressured , swindled , or hustled like I have by a technician from another company . He was very honest . I will definitely call them in the future .

name: Alphonso Hicks
text: My system was installed in 2014 by TC. I wasn’t impressed with the old owners, and the way they did business. The new owners are great and the Technicians are so much better than what we’ve seen in the past. Eddie did the maintenance recently and did a great job. Found some issues from the initial install and took care of them at no cost to us. Really appreciate the new owners and staff.

name: Helen Nuelle
text: My air conditioning was not functioning and the company came in checked it out  and made recommendations to correct the problem. Our new system is efficient and it was installed quickly.

name: Earl Cambron
text: Great experience working with Fisher. Would highly recommend Fisher and Total Comfort!

name: Jackie Jones
text: Thank heavens Total Comfort Hearing & Air is under new ownership! In June 2017 we replaced our old units with two American Standard ac & heating units under the previous owner and the installers were awful.  We had small gas leaks on both units, insulation around the refrigerant lines was half ass done on the downstairs unit and not even replaced on the upstairs which was dried & cracking, etc.  When I called to have the has gas smell checked out the new owners were eager to get someone sent out immediately. The smell was intermittent so I wasn't sure if there was an issue. The first time Sonny came out & took care of the downstairs gas smell.  A few hours after he left the air purifier wasn't working.  Eddie came to our house and fixed and also noticed the "dryer" was installed backwards on the both units. He corrected both problems in addition to gas smell upstairs, & addressed the insulation on the refrigerant lines.  Eddie was wonderful! We so appreciate the time he has spent to address the install issues. My husband owns a construction company and we've dealt with several HVAC companies for our home & business....hands down we are so impressed with the service Total Comfort provides.  The ladies in the office are the first impression of the company and they are awesome! Total Comfort will continue to receive our business due to the great service & and friendly demeanor of their employees!

name: Ethan Jones
text: Eddie came out to my parents place yesterday. I really appreciate the time he took taking care of their needs and he was very polite and professional. We had some less than happy experiences with this company before the new owners took over, but it looks like they have really turned things around for the better.

name: Scott Williams
text: Total Comfort came out this afternoon.  The technician was Harry. He was very polite and informative. We are getting a new furnace installed on Monday. I would highly recommend Total Comfort to anyone. Thank you so much!! Scott Williams

name: Anne Vicknair
text: After the last service my AC unit wasn’t cooling properly. Called TotalComfort and Eddie came out on a weekend and found the problem and easily corrected it at no charge. Not many companies will stand behind their work like that anymore. Really appreciate the kind and prompt service.

name: Sandra Reaves
text: Gary was very prompt, professional, and efficient.  We really appreciated his courtesy. He quickly got our air conditioner up and running.  In this hot weather, that makes him a super hero to us!!  Thank you so very much!

name: Jason Lane Garrison
text: If you’re looking for a company that’s reliable, professional and do honest work look no more.  I heard Total Comfort Heating was under new management so I was reluctant to call them but did they change my mind when I used them.  Quick to respond, professional and spent the time explaining what was going on with my unit. I’ll definitely use them again.

name: Danny Brown
text: My a/c was not operating correctly so I placed a call to One Source Heating and Cooling and asked for a service man to visit and find the problem.The ladies in the office were very nice and professional and arranged for him to come and access the situation. Sonny   ( the serviceman) arrived right on time and quickly found the problem and had me going in about 10 minutes. He was very professional as well and I certainly will be calling them again for all of my heating and cooling needs. They are the best company for their honesty, punctuality, dependability, professionalism and affordability. I'm so grateful to have them.

name: John Casada
text:
We have two HVAC systems. Total Comfort replaced our first system two years ago. Our second started acting up and we called Total Comfort again.
Harry was quick to come out, located the problems with our system and patiently explained what was wrong. He then discussed all of our options for repairing vs replacing. Unfortunately, we had to replace our 26 year old Trane system. Harry really helped us with this bad news and discussed financing options.  I hate that we have to go through this, but I am so glad that Harry was by our side. Top notch customer service with highly skilled, clean, courteous, can-do technicians. Highly recommend!

name: Carolyn Nelson
text: I’ve dealt with Total Comfort many times from maintenance to repairs and I’ve always been satisfied by their service. Eddy has been out to help us before and always seems to go that extra length to take care of our needs. We really appreciate everyone.

name: FLYBY
text: Had tech arrive, a young and inexperienced boy, explained the issues with the units, the tech did visual inspection only, never hooked up gauges, stated system is working fine. I realized the system was not working, I called 4 times, no one returned my calls, was not allowed to speak to the Manager, Jody, and was told it would be additional charge to come back. Be careful.

name: Cheryl Whitley
text: Sonny, the worker that came to help me on my AC today was a very polite, kind, and thoughtful person who took his time to explain everything that he did and why. There aren’t a lot of people who do that and I appreciate that! Thanks Sonny! Thanks Total Comfort for having a worker like Sonny!

name: Sonya Smith
text: Great experience from start to finish. I talked to Chelsea in the office and she sent Eddie out to service my Furnace the same day. Very friendly and knowledgeable company.

name: Robert Blackwell
text: Love the new owners and their Service Technicians! Eddie took care of everything we needed and got our AC running the same night. Vast improvements in service since the new owners took over.

name: Jason Lassiter
text:
Amending my original review: after an initial failure to properly schedule my appointment (see original review below) Total Comfort called the next business day to apologize and to make things right. They offered to send a technician right away and offered to waive the service call fee to make up for the inconvenience. I really appreciated this. Anyone who accepts responsibility for a mistake and makes a good faith effort to fix things gets a second chance with me. The technician, who was nice and professional, quickly found and fixed the issue (a simple clog). Before he left we got a call from the owner who explained that there would be no charge for the service. All in all Total Comfort really turned things around and they will get my future business.

Original Review: I made an appointment. They did not call and did not show. Can't recommend.

name: Rick Whited II
text: Everyone I got to work with was extremely polite, knowledgeable and very professional.

resp.text:
Thanks for the kind words.  We look forward to working with you in the future.

Thanks,

Keith

name: Alantha Russ
text: Nothing but good things to say about this company. Eddie came out today for the normal maintenance and did a great job as usual. We really appreciate the time Total Comfort puts in to making sure a job is done right.

name: Sam Henderson
text: Total Comfort came to our rescue!  This winter Charter/ Spectrum caused an electricity surge at my house starting and electrical fire, frying my HVAC system and frying the motor on a refrigerator and freezer. Total Comfort saved us before it got to cold by coming out and quoting us a fair cost and then doing the repairs quickly and with quality work. I know I will continue to use them!  Great people. Great Service. As for Charter, not so much.

name: Kaz McFly
text: I thought I needed to replace my AC but Harry with Total Comfort came out and spotted the problem and fixed it. He could have gotten me to buy a new unit but didn't. Instead he allowed me to take my time and not make a rush decision by fixing the problem. I highly recommend Total Comfort. Honest, nice and fast service

name: Frankie Roe
text: We had a great experience with Total Comfort Heating and Air. Our heat had stopped working suddenly.  When I called the office to make the appt., the lady I spoke with was helpful and courteous. Gary came out, was very nice, and within a few minutes, our heat was up and running again.  Would highly recommend these folks!!

name: Dennis Bryant
text: I bought a unit from this Company 10 years ago and it was an awful experience. To much to list. The unit went down this winter and i called to check on warranty information on the unit. Now this unit was purchased for my parents house and both are disabled. With that said my guard was up. As i placed the call i found that Total Comfort is under new management. Expecting the worst. Boy was i wrong. The new management and ownership at Total Comfort was a huge breathe of fresh air. The team at Total Comfort was honest and up front with me from the start. They offered about as much help to me as they could. The Technician named Soni that worked on my parents unit went above and beyond to take care of my parents. If you had a bad experience in the past then believe me its a new day with this Company. I personally want to say thank you to the team at Total Comfort for bending over backwards to give me any and every option they could. From an angry customer years ago to a customer that will only call the new team at Total for anything me or my family members need. Thank you Total for all your help.

name: Belinda Allen
text: Great company. Eddie came and installed a part I needed yesterday. Very polite and friendly.

name: J Davis
text: Can’t say enough good things about this company! Gary came out on a Saturday after 6 to fix our air out at Logan Martin. When I say that we were suffering, we were absolutely miserable in this house! It took him less than 10 minutes to fix the issue and cooled down a house full of women who came home after a Pell City mud run to an 87 degree house. Highly recommend Gary and Total Comfort heat and air!

name: Keely O'Really
text: Very honest and quick to diagnose our problems. We had 2 other companies come out and tell us 2 different things are wrong with our A/C unit only to find out by the Total Comfort tech that that was not the problem and even got our AC running for the time being until we could get it fix. Great service, came on time, and very polite and knowledgable. I recommend them to anyone who is in need of AC repair.

name: Margret Battle
text: Eddie came out last week to clean our package unit and thankfully caught some small issues before they caused major problems. He gave us a good price for repairs and helped us get financed quickly. Thanks TC

name: Diane Cook
text:
Absolutely wonderful experience. I had a total HVAC replacement plus blown in insulation. All technicians were on time, clean, courteous and completely professional. I will give them an A+ for a great job done.
Diane Cook

name: Kendall Jackson
text: Great experience.  Excellent new management and fair pricing!  Prompt service response.  Would recommend

name: Jason Smith
text: Just had our whole system replaced, and the guys at Total Comfort did a great job. Gary kept in touch with his whereabouts and time frame for the initial service call, and got the broken down system patched up long enough to get the new system in the following morning . The guys showed up with all the equipment before 8am and went straight to work after a friendly meet and greet with our dogs, who love company . They were both friendly and efficient, cleaned up after themselves, finished well before the estimated time frame, and did it all for a price that was on the low side of what we expected to pay . I would recommend these guys for any heating and cooling needs.

name: Carrie Cotney
text: Great experience! The service technician was polite and worked efficiently to solve our issue.  The new owners have done a great job!  I highly recommend Total Comfort Heating and Air.

name: Paige Cooper
text: I would recommend DJ for any services needed. He is friendly, courteous, and he cares about his customers.

name: Dustin Wilkerson
text: Excellent company to do business with. I highly recommend giving these guys a chance if you are in need of any HVAC work. It is my understanding they are under new ownership and are eager to ensure all of their customers are happy. They have definitely earned future business and recommendations from me.

name: Cal Markert
text: Saved me money with honest access net and only charged 50 for service call.  They knew what they were doing too.  Very pleased

name: Byron Williams
text: Thanks to Total Comfort for getting use up and running again. We appreciate the quick service and professional staff that came out to service our HVAC. After the tech explained everything I could readily see the problem and felt very comfortable going ahead with the repair. They where very professional.  We are very impressed.

name: Nathan Whitaker
text: We are attempting to sell our house and had an issue arise during inspection. Eddie had serviced the unit 2 weeks earlier and everything was in working order. We explained the issue about how we were held up with being able to close because of the inspection. Total Comfort went above and beyond and immediately came to ensure things were ok. Turns out that the inspector was wrong. The unit was working correctly. I video taped it to show the buyers the problem was not Total Comfort. It was their inspector. We have used Totsl Comfort for years and plan to have them install and new unit at our new home later. Eddie is the man!

name: debby cochran
text: Brett Shelton,  my service professional, was very nice and knowledgeable.I find they seem to care a lot about the customers.I would totally recommend them.

name: Holly Chapman
text: Thankful for the New Management for quickly repairing my unit. Professional, on time, and trust worthy. I would choose Total Comfort again and again and you should too!

name: Joe Randall
text: Cody was honest and efficient and took care of my problem. Will definitely call again.

name: Terry Payton
text: Glad they have new owners.  The new ones are terrific!   Took great care of us fast and very fair price.  Thanks again!

name: Stan Paschenko
text: Total Comfort has serviced my Hvac units for the past 3 years. I recommend this company because of their honesty and integrity. No pushy sales pitch.

name: Kelsey
text: I had an emergency call after coming home to an 86 degree house. There's technician was extremely friendly but no resolution was provided. Ther problem he said I had wasn't the problem at all. I missed an entire day of work to be told mid morning the next day noon one could come until afternoon. I could've gone to work in AC for the morning! Very disappointed in the level of service provided.

name: Valerie Chavez
text: Just  had total comfort heating and air come to my home and they just installed this new thermostat I could not be more pleased with their work friendly service and the price was just right.

name: JP Jones
text: David was very good at  doing his job and knowledgeable. Great personality

name: Christy Thomas
text: New owners and management are fantastic!  Good quality customer service!  Very pleased with the work and it was completed in a timely manner.  Would definitely recommend!

name: Mike Gillespie
text: Very nice on the phone. Called to let us know the technician was on the way. Technician could not have been more helpful or professional with his explanations and wanting things to be done correctly! Would recommend them to anyone!!

name: Tracie Lewis
text: The tech was very courteous and professional. He and the company went above and beyond. Would highly recommend Total Comfort!

name: Jimmy Owen
text:
Setting the appointment was easy and the agent worked very well to set the appointment which was convenient for me.
The technician was great and explained everything very well.

name: JP Jones
text: David was very good at  doing his job and knowledgeable. Great personality

name: Blakely Segroves
text: We were so impressed with the new owners!  Prompt and reliable service to repair my unit.  Would highly recommend them!

name: Kandy Kane
text:
Eddie was fantastic!!! Very professional and quick at fixing our problem.
We will only be using this company from now on! If you have any problems with your heating or air, definitely give Total Comfort a call!

name: Julian Kit
text: Called them out after our unit stopped working. The guy who came out only saw $$$, down played our system every chance he could. Said its to small for the house (our house is fairly small and it's always keep us plenty warm). Told us our system had rust which was causing the problem but got it working by taking a piece of wire and cleaning out the sensor. Took less than 2 min to get the system working but cost almost 100$ for next to no work. 18 point inspection is also a lie.

name: Linda Fomby
text: Tyler arrived in a timely manner and solved my problem. Very efficient.

name: Betty Gunter
text: Eddie was at our home yesterday and he’s such a sweetheart. We felt a little silly when he told us why our furnace wasn’t working but we’ll know what to look for next time. Thanks!

name: Rod Bunn Florida
text: Dj was courteous and knowledgeable and did a great job, I would recommend him to everyone I know

name: Joanne Walker
text: Great Service starting with the operator who took my request for a service call, to the technician who came. Thank you Sonny for being on time, courteous, polite and your very thorough checkup of our heat and air system.

name: Curtis Nargo
text:
Total comfort heating and air LLC today August 18, 2016 as I am traveling down for 59 in Hoover I started hearing cracking sounds on my windshield as I got closer to the source while other cars were swerving to get away from this truck that was carrying loose rocks in the back of a small flatbed trailer uncovered and rocks falling all over the highway.  I saw two cars get struck with windshield broken my car was struck twice
with star break cracks in windshield, and as ice sped up to get around this total comfort heating and air truck IT LOOK LIKE HE WAS JUST LAUGHING AT ME!  I dialed there number tried to call but they kept hanging up on me stay away from this company if they don't have enough sense to haul gravel in the proper way.Bad reviews on these guys. !!

name: Rod Bunn Florida
text: Dj was courteous and knowledgeable and did a great job, I would recommend him to everyone I know

name: Curtis Nargo
text:
Total comfort heating and air LLC today August 18, 2016 as I am traveling down for 59 in Hoover I started hearing cracking sounds on my windshield as I got closer to the source while other cars were swerving to get away from this truck that was carrying loose rocks in the back of a small flatbed trailer uncovered and rocks falling all over the highway.  I saw two cars get struck with windshield broken my car was struck twice
with star break cracks in windshield, and as ice sped up to get around this total comfort heating and air truck IT LOOK LIKE HE WAS JUST LAUGHING AT ME!  I dialed there number tried to call but they kept hanging up on me stay away from this company if they don't have enough sense to haul gravel in the proper way.Bad reviews on these guys. !!

name: James Howlett
text: Eddie came out and took care of our Furnace quickly and gave us a great price for the repair. Will be using this company in the future.

name: Vista Brooks
text: Awesome Company!!! New management that still believes in making sure that mistakes that were made before are fixed. Quick service and a great staff!!!

name: Lillian Wilson
text: They have always been on time and very polite people.I am so glad we used them for our heating and air :)

name: lori krauss
text: Can not say enough about this company and Gary Dailey.  We noticed our air was not working around 3 pm on a Saturday. We were at our lake house in Talladega. I called four other companies, that said they were 24/7. None would return a call. No one even answered. I called Total Comfort and spoke to Gary. We were almost near heat stroke at this point. He could sense the desperation in my voice. He said let me make a few calls, and if I'm able I'll be on my way. Ten minutes later he called back and said he was on his way. Drove from Gardendale to Talladega to look at our unit and see what could be done. He was a lifesaver. It was the capacitor. He had a new one on his truck, and fixed it within 30 minutes. What normally would have cost a lot, on a Saturday evening was a few hundred bucks or so. I would have given them 10 stars if I could have. WE WILL NEVER USE ANYONE BUT TOTAL COMFORT AGAIN!!! IM not a person that leaves reviews, but I have never seen such amazing customer service EVER.

name: Zach Batizy
text:
Was quick and efficient. Helped solve the problem really well

-Sheila Batizy

name: Jay Cardwell
text: Harry did an outstanding job and he was very professional

name: Mora Taylor
text: Sonny was very professional and explained the process very well. I would highly recommend Sonny and Total Comfort Heating and Air.

name: Terrance Darling
text:
Great job!! Knowledgeable technicians!!! Thanks Harry and Sam.

Mr. Darling

name: B K Gray
text: Worst experience I ever had. Do not, and I repeat do not use this company. Misleading techs, customer service is terrible. Been trying to get a refund, will not return phone calls. I have a service level agreement, and had to buy a new unit from them(which now I don't believe I needed), and they treat you like crap. Everything is about $$$ to them. I agree with Julian

name: Madison Garner
text: They are very unloyal and misleading to their employees! The owner has very bad anger issues and treats people with the upmost disrespect! I wouldn't dare recommend their services not only because of how he does his employees, but by his general characteristic traits. Also the fact that he only hires " attractive young women" ( for office work), is also very disturbing and discriminating. He also doesn't seem to concerned with his customers either. Unless your buying a new unit or signing a service agreement you mean nothing to him.

name: Bryan Blackmon
text: Right Now, Christmas Eve 2014 marks less than 6 months with my new system (old one was 20+ years old and died) from this company. The installation re-used some of the parts from the old system. I have had to call them back out now for the third time in less than 6 months to check on the system and while the people are very friendly, I am highly unsatisfied. A unit of this age (when properly installed) should have zero issues cooling a townhome of my size and should (in general) have no problems. It is now Christmas Eve 2014 and all creatures are stirring because the damned-new HVAC Heat Pump will not cool off my home. Thanks.

name: Lonnie Moore
text: Technician showed up on time, assessed the problem and quickly fixed it. You can’t ask for more than that.

name: Barbie Moore
text: Extremely friendly and fast service 🙂🙂🙂

name: Calvin D Tucker II
text: Service above excellent!

name: Jessica Ray
text: Very professional, excellent customer service.

name: Soleado C
text: Awesome!!!!

name: Joseph Jackson
text: Honest, Experienced, Trustworthy, Timely, and Fair.

name: Joycelyn Oden
text: I had a very good experience with this company! I will be using them again!

name: Kurtis Boone
text: Driver nearly hit me twice at the gas station mabey have them get off theeir phone when they get behind the wheel

name: Qi Wan
text: We had our two water heaters installed by this company years ago. One malfunctioned yesterday (2/16/2021, of course always on the very cold weather). I called the company line and reported the problem and requested service. Zack called me yesterday around 1 pm and he promised to try to come here around 8 am today 2/17/2021.He never showed up or called me to reschedule. I called him around 8:10 this morning and have not heard from him yet. Very unprofessional and disappointing service. This is my first call and contact with this company. We are still sitting in the cold and waiting for the service.

name: Stella Camp
text: Best experience ever. My work was done as promised. Very courteous people.

name: Jay Ange
text: Prompt response & top quality service for my residential AC issue yesterday.

name: sarah tompkins
text: Very good performance

name: Grace Ragland
text: Hutchens Company came to my rescue.  They were able to quickly and reasonably install a remote thermostat plus help me with my mildew issues by also installing an attic tent.  Great Service and trustworthy company!  Thank you Hutchens Co. for your help.

name: Carolann Bledsoe
text: Best plumber in the business!  Very thorough, very kind and best job I've ever had!  Recommend Hutchens always!

name: Ryan Evancik
text:
My brother and I own a vacation home in Huntsville.  Our Air went out over the summer and what a nightmare!  We called several companies prior to finding The Hutchens Company.  The first company that came out was unprofessional and very expensive.

We then found the Hutchens Company and man what difference.  They were very professional, on time, offered to fix the problem right away however we ended up replacing the equipment.  They started the install the same day and our new unit was operating mid the next morning.

Thanks Hutchens Company, you guys are the best!

name: Liz Laney
text: I have been using the Hutchens Company for 10 years, for HVAC purchases and repairs at 2 homes. I have always found them to offer quick and top quality service, competitively priced.

name: Laurel Bailey
text: The Hutchens Company is very responsive and cost conscious when it comes to working on my HVAC units. They also do a great job with plumbing work, emergencies and preventative work as well.

name: Darren Malone
text: Great, longstanding local company with wonderful customer service, top to bottom!

name: Jonathan Evancik
text: A very professional company with great technicians and installers.

name: tflydon
text: I have used Hutchens Company several times.  They have always been responsive and have got the job done in a timely efficient manner.

name: R Michael Banish
text: Quality people, sensitive to customer needs and expectations.  I trust these guys.

name: George D
text: Great people and honest service!

name: Tina Hunter
text: Great place.

name: Terry Merritt
text:
AWESOME SERVICE and AWESOME PRICES!
(Honest, integrity, fair, compassionate etc...)
The absolute BEST in town!!!!!

Hands down this company is the best in town! They try their best to save money when possible rater than trying to “up-sale” when a quick fix is an option.  Their Tech, (Chris Carr) is awesome!  He was so very helpful, considerate and professional.   Our experience with using this company on 4/13/21 has made us “Joyful Jolly Clients Forever”. If you looking for an honest company who sincerely looks for ways to help customers save money then call Jolly ONLY, you won’t be disappointed trust me.
I’d give this company 15 stars if I could as they rank far above 5 stars in every category from the first call I made to the end of the service call.
I would not just rate them “good” on their evaluation, I would rate them “great” in every category. They are all excellent and very professional.   They have made us “new customers”  for life because of customer service, quality and affordability  and we plan to tell everyone we know on Facebook and social media as word of mouth and great experience is the best advertising.
Jolly has brought back the true old fashion “customer service”  we once expected years ago that got lost over the years.  If you want to experience the traditional customer service of years ago, call JOLLY!

Simply a great company for in every single category!

name: Danny Kirchar
text: This was by far the most pleasant and professional encounter I have ever had with a company before. The technician was super polite and extremely warm and gracious and thoroughly explained the services needed AND gave me an exact cost. It did take a little while to get together the money for him. But even then he remained very patient and extremely helpful and just so pleasant. I'll never use another HVAC service as long as Jolly is in business

resp.text: Thank you so much for your business and support of our family!

name: Jennifer Noland
text: Beware! Technician came to my house to rewire a thermostat. Once there, he told me that we had blown the transformer and fuse on the main unit and the cost at that point would be $624 to replace those 2 things and rewire the thermostat. I told him I couldn't afford that and he said "well mam I can't help you with that. There's nothing else I can do for you then." I needed my ac running so I gathered up every cent I had and told him to go ahead with the repair. He then came in and told me that the thermostat wasn't telling the unit to kick on so we must have fried the new thermostat also. He left the base plate wired up and told me that it was wired correctly and I just needed to go get a new touchpad and it would work. He is a professional and I trusted his word so I paid him the $600 and he left without it working. It was late Saturday night so I ran and got the new one first thing Sunday morning. I put it on the wall and it would not work. I had to call another repairman to come out and fix it Sunday. There was nothing wrong with the 1st thermostat. The problem was that the Jolly technician wired it wrong. Now I question everything he did that night. I feel like I paid a lot of money for absolutely nothing. I have called twice and cannot get a call back. I should have refused to pay but I trusted this guys word. I will not make that mistake again. Please be careful when dealing with this company!!!!

resp.text:
Jennifer,
We are looking into the ticket now.  We are sorry to learn that your experience with Jolly was anything less than stellar!  Someone from our office will be contacting you shortly.

name: James Lee
text: Responded quickly and took care of job.

name: Lisbeth Weinheimer
text: Very professional service with quick responsiveness to our issue.  We were out of town and our dog sitter alerted us that our AC had stopped working.  Jolly Heat and Air was recommended by a friend that had used them in the past. By the time we got home the service man was already finishing up and had restored our cooling system. It was so nice to come back to a cool home! The technician, Travis was very knowledgeable and helped us understand what was wrong with our unit. We would highly recommend Jolly to anyone who has Hvac issues.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words!  We are thrilled that you are pleased with our service.

name: Ronnie Causey
text: Technician was right on point and very helpful...

resp.text: Thank you for leaving a review about your experience with Jolly!  We are so pleased that you are happy with your service.

name: Lisa Getts-Folsom
text: Very nice and knowledge staff. Honest and trustworthy.

text: This company ALWAYS has sent me professional and curteous technicians. Angel answered the phone and took my call. She is always so nice! Today Ethan came in a timely manner and within 20 min had resolved the issue and left. I have used Jolly for almost ten years and wouldn't dream of choosing anyone else.

text: My appointment was from 1-4pm I called at 1:30pm and they actually had someone available to come. Russ came within 20 minutes introduced himself and in about 12 minutes has figured out what was wrong with my ac. It was pricey but it had to be done! He already had called and checked on the parts and was ready to go get them. He fixed the issues in a timely manner! Very polite and great customer service! Really great experience with jolly!

Provided a good over view of the system and items that would probably need repair in the future along with estimates so I could plan and budget for the work.  Overall great job and would recommend the company to anyone needing AC services.

text:
After a two year absolute nightmare with our home warranty company (American Home Shield) who sent Meyer’s Comfort Specialist to our home to install a new air conditioner, we now have a new unit installed by Jolly!!!  Our new unit cools fabulous!!!  There were so many things that were not up to code with our previously installed unit including a coil that was installed backwards!!!!!!!  Taylor and Travis came to our house, were there all day and answered every question that we had no matter how small they may have been.  They both worked tirelessly!!! They said our attic was the hottest of the year so far and even with that worked to make sure everything was brought to code and installed properly!!!! I can not thanks Jolly enough for their patience and understanding with these very frustrated home owners!!!!!  WE APPRECIATE YOU ALL!!!!!!! A BIG thanks to Angel too for all of the times that I called to ask a question!!!!! I WOULD RECOMMEND THEM
OVER AND OVER AGAIN!!!

resp.text: Hi Brian.  Thank you for giving us feedback about your experience with Jolly.  We did some research on the call and would like to speak with you further about how you felt about the service call.  We tried reaching out to you.  Check your inbox when you get a chance.

text: Technician was prompt kind courteous extremely knowledgeable and gave us a very good price I wouldn't go to anywhere else in town

name: Andy Maddox
text: I called Jolly early in the morning to set up appointment between 1:00 and 4:00 PM. It was around 3:30 and I was starting to wonder if they were going to miss the scheduled appointment and not call me. They called me around 3:45 to let me know that technicians were running a little late but they would definitely be coming today (I appreciated the courtesy call). Technician called me around 4:10 to let me know they were on their way. They also emailed me with a short bio on the technician and his photo. When I got home to meet them, they had already fixed the unit. Friendly, professional and didn't feel like I was getting scammed. Great experience. I will use them again in the future. Much better experience than another major HVAC contractor in Tuscaloosa. Jolly is my new "go-to" HVAC contractor in Tuscaloosa.

resp.text: Thank you so much for leaving a review for our company.  Your attention to detail and well written review will help others to know what to expect when calling for service.  We truly appreciate you!

resp.text: Thank you, Sheryl!  We appreciate your feedback.  We will be sure to share your comments with Russ.

name: Jackson Willis
text:
Very prompt service, however the promptness comes at a high price. Came first thing in the morning and fixed what they thought was the problem. $80 diagnostic and then $120 to clean the flame sensor. $120 is really high for that, but the service had already been performed before I was informed of it, so had to pay.

Left, had an issue 2 hours later. Came back quickly, which was nice, but found that the circuit board was bad on the furnace. Had to replace. Very high price that I was able to negotiate down a little bit, but now my heat works.

Great service, but at an astronomical price.

text: Very friendly and professional staff! Russ was our tech and we give him 5 stars as well! Definitely recommending Jolly to others!

text: Service came at a GREAT price. Too expensive for my budget but I had to get my air repaired asap because i was having surgery the following  day.

resp.text: Hi Annette!  I know that air conditioning repairs can be an unexpected expense so we so try and give competitive prices for our services.   There is almost always a coupon being offered to help with some of the cost to repair.  This coupon is on our website and Facebook page for use at any time.  Coupon expired? Just give us a call and we will be more than happy to work you.  Providing same day service and well- trained technicians can incur a cost that we do our best to keep as low as possible.  I get that not everyone can make the choice to use Jolly.  Our service does not work for everyone’s budget. If you decide it works for you, we’d love to have you.

text: Jolly is a great company.  Technician did great work and gave great money-saving advise. Will definitely use Jolly again n the future!

name: Julie Lewis
text: I am so thankful for Jolly Heating & Air.  I called them about a problem with my A/C unit and they were at my house within the hour. I have 2 children who would have been frozen in our cold winter if it wasn't for them coming out so quickly. Thank you for your speedy service! Will definitely use again and will recommend to anyone who needs work done quickly.

name: Anne Davis
text: The company sent a person the very same day I called with a problem. The young man was very knowledgeable and very delightful to talk with. So happy we bought our gas logs from Jolly Heating, we have enjoyed them so much!

name: Martin Agnew
text:
While in the process of selling my home, a technician came out to inspect my fully functioning unit. After leaving, my unit was no longer pushing air through the house and there was a pungent burning smell. I contacted Jolly, but no assistance was offered without a $150 service call charge plus the cost of parts, which he said would run around $2,500. He then quickly solicited me to instead consider buying a new unit from them instead of paying the $2,500 to repair the unit.

The next day I had a technician from another HVAC company come to look at the unit and they said the report Jolly had written was nearly entirely false, and the reason the unit was no longer working was because the technician from Jolly did not reconnect the blower wheel.

Not only might this affect the sale of my home, but my wife and 18 month old daughter were forced to stay somewhere else because they had no heat in the middle of December.

resp.text:
Mr. Agnew,
Anytime you have an issue with a price, you can always call the office during normal business hours and talk to our Office Manager.  She is always here willing to help.  I cannot confirm what the other company you called out found.  I trust my technicians and their expertise more than any other company.  An inspection took place and the proper pictures are on file from that inspection.  All paperwork supports the repairs noted in the inspection.

name: Julie Lewis
text: I am so thankful for Jolly Heating & Air.  I called them about a problem with my A/C unit and they were at my house within the hour. Will definitely use again and will recommend to anyone who needs work done quickly.

text: I would HIGHLY recommend Polar Bear Services for any and all cooling and heating needs. name: Regina Evans-Barrentine
text: My husband has been piecemealing our 30 yr old HVAC unit for 8 years and finally, the heat condenser rusted out, clogged up to the point carbon monoxide was present.  We shut the unit down and have been riding it out for a few weeks without heat or air not wanting to spend a lot of money going into 'Winter 2020' during a pandemic.  Now it is getting down into the 30's, so we made the calls...  The moment I contacted Polar Bear Services, Billy Weller, the owner responded.  I told him what was going on, what we needed and wanted from the type of unit to warranties. Mr Weller gave us a quote and offered several payment options.  We had other quotes to compare this to and Polar Bear was by far the most affordable for the exact same system. We chose Polar Bear and Mr Weller had his crew here the following morning to replace the entire system.  The technicians were on time, very polite, professional, know what they're doing AND they replaced the old single-wall pipes to double-wall getting us up to Code too.  I strongly recommend Billy Weller & Polar Bear Services... I give Polar Bear an A+!

name: Courtney Parrish
text: My fiancé and I just recently bought a house. We called Polar Bear services to come out to check our ac unit because of something to do with our inspection. They said everything was fine. A week later, the temperature in the house starts rising so we call them out to look at it again. First, they told us they’d be out in a few hours since no one was home at the time. They call my fiancé back a couple minutes later and say they are at the house waiting on us and he proceeds to tell the guy he told someone on the phone no one was there for at least another hour. The service guy got angry with us because of poor communication within the company. Then, the service guy proceeds to tell me it’s because the unit “might” be low on Freon. He never looked at the system in the basement, just outside so I don’t know how he got an accurate solution.  He charged us for the most expensive Freon (he only used 1 lb) and $99 for less than an hour of service. Needless to say, it was a complete waste of time and money because the problem was ongoing and we had another company come out a few days later. That company was able to tell us the problem right away which the other guy would have, maybe, known had he looked at the system in the basement. Needless to say, the Polar Bear services guy didn’t seem to know what he was doing but had no problem charging an unnecessary, large amount of money. We will not be using this company again.

resp.text: I am sorry that you were not happy with your experience with Polar Bear Services.  I reviewed your invoice and saw where the tech had added one pound of R22 to your system to achieve his pressures.  We were unaware of your dissatisfaction with our services and would like the opportunity to talk to you.  Thank you.

name: k Harris
text: $3850 + $79.99 wasted!!!!! Our AC stopped working and we were advised we need a coil and condensor replaced. The fee for that was $3850. A month later the ac went back to blowing hot air. We called for PB to come back out and the technician stated a part was loose and needed to be replaced from the first service job and we would not be charged. That fixed it for about another month or two. The next technician stated a frog short circuited the system and he removed it and the ac went back to blowing like it should for another couple weeks. Every visit after the alleged frog incident has been one excuse after the other. We're doing renovations and were told the filters needed to be changed more frequently and the house would cool down. We continued to change them weekly and still no luck. We called yet again to advise of the continuing problem only to be charged $79.99 for them to clean the coils and blame the filters. The AC still continued to blow hot air and then the attic began to leak. So ANOTHER call was made. The technician stated the coils were frozen and that the ac needed to be turned off and to change the filter again (at this point we're already changing it weekly and have completed the renovations). The house still didnt cool down and the ac was still leaking. Another call was made the same day (as a leaking attic is urgent and ruining the ceiling) the technician returned and said the coil was shooting out water (ya think!!!! That's why we called in the first place!) had they bothered to look and not blame it on the filter they would have discovered it on the first visit. So the technician fixes the leak and says give it time, the house will cool. Guess what, it's still not cooling!!! So we wait a week (we work and can't keep taking off for someone to come out) and call them back out. The technician now states the roof doesnt have enough vents  and the attic door is off centered and that is what's causing the house not to cool. He said he tweaked something and give it a minute and it will cool. He also states he was advised to charge for coming out. What is there to charge for? The house is still hot, the temperature is steady rising as I type, and the original problem has not been fixed. They're basically grasping  at straws at this point and have run out of probable excuses.  Be prepared to throw away $4000 plus dollars and live in heat if you use this company. Currently in search of another AC company.

resp.text: We are sorry to hear about your experience, we would appreciate if you could call us to discuss this and see if we could resolve your problems.

name: Mary Catherine Barnes Sutphin
text:
I can not say enough wonderful things about this company, from the scheduling desk to the service crew, they are all amazing! I would like to give a special “thank you” to the three men that came to our home in the past two days, John, Brody, & Steve. All three men delivered top quality customer service, while also allowing me, as a stay at home mom, a sense of trust and comfort that the service being provided to us was one we needn’t question. These gentlemen were very thorough with their original diagnostic visit, and also very kind to answer all of my questions. I have hired companies, prior to Bradberry , to repair our HVAC unit, and many a time I have been left feeling “swindled” or ignored. (I.E. rather discuss the business at hand with my husband). We’ve had multiple companies, even just send out a salesperson, instead of looking at all possible cost saving options for our family’s financial situation. I have been disheartened by other companies, to say the least...

That’s why I am so honored to write a five star review for the company of, Bradberry. They have gone above and beyond meeting my expectations. For years our family has “band aided” our AC unit, we knew it would be in the near future to get a new unit, however, Bradberry, and their service workers, still gave us multiple different options to consider.

After much deliberation, my husband and I did decide to replace the HVAC UNIT. All diagnostics, financing, and installation were done in 24hrs. (Keep in mind this is also at the end of May, in Alabama, when the heat is unbearable). These gentlemen had a kind smile on their faces the whole time, while also giving clear and concise details on what to expect going forward.

Like I said, I cannot say enough wonderful things about the customer service and products that Bradberry delivered to our family.
Thank you to the three gentlemen and the company of Bradberry for exceeding my expectations. I am truly thankful, and so much more comfortable!

-Mary Sutphin

resp.text: Thanks for your business Mary Catherine!! We are glad your experience was nothing short of great. Please spread the word in your area and we will take care of anyone you send our way.

name: Rose Cavender
text:
** HIGHLY RECOMMEND!! **
have recently purchased my first home and my gas hot water heater had been going out. They replaced the hot water heater, but I still didn’t have hot water in the showers. I called the emergency phone number and told them my issue, the woman was incredibly nice and someone had returned my phone call within 30 minutes and was on my way to fix the issue at 8:30pm. Unfortunately, the next day after the fix, I still didn’t have hot water (it wasn’t staying warm long enough for a shower) and I called the emergency number again (it was 9:30pm). Same woman answered, again, incredibly nice. Within the hour, someone had reached my cell number and was scheduling an appt for the next day to resolve the issue (they would’ve come that night but I had to be at work so I told them to wait until the next day).
Long story short, it had nothing to do with the hot water heater, but the fixtures in the shower had recently been replaced prior to the inspection on my house. So the service man, Robert, changed the settings in both shower fixtures to allow more hot water to come out.
Great service, quick reply time and great all around!

name: Rob Kizer
text:
In fairness to the reader and the company my experience was as followed:
My old unit went out, I had just moved into this home about 6 months beforehand. Seeing the service number on the unit I called them just because they had serviced the unit before. They came out and were straight shooters after evaluating the unit that day, and determined it had to be replaced. After taking the time I needed to make a decision on the unit they promptly scheduled a service date and installed the unit.
I had an extremely high power bill the following month, and to their credit the technician came out on a Saturday in the middle of potential severe weather and identified and hopefully resolved the issue that caused my power bill to be so high. I give these guys the benefit of the doubt, and chalk it up to an anomaly. I don't expect to see a bill for the correction, and I DO recommend their service in the future because they strike me as good, hard working, and honest people.

resp.text: Rob, I’m aware of the issue with your old existing thermostat wiring in the wall, and I apologize for the issue. I appreciate your fair review in this matter. Of course there is not a charge at all for the work we performed Saturday to correct your issue in pulling new thermostat wire. We appreciate your business and please let us know if there is anything else we can do in the future!

name: Kyle Jernigan
text: 1,000% recommend these guys. Bought a new house and it has 2 units which are over 10 years old, so naturally they've needed some attention. Every time I've called BSC they get a serviceman to my house within an hour and guess what? He has what he needs on his truck to make the repair!!! I've called other companies before and they have to go get a part and come back or they have to call someone else to come look at the problem, but these guys are good - they know what they're doing and get you fixed on the spot. They're also neat when they work, they've never left a mess behind which happened to me with another company, never called them back even when they did good work. I'll take someone who does great work AND doesn't trash my attic.

resp.text: Thanks for your business and the review! Sharing your experience helps others find the great service you experienced.

name: amanda griffin
text: Bradberry Service Company is top notch!  Called on a Sunday, had a new HVAC unit and electric hot water heater installed and running on Wednesday afternoon. We were amazed to watch the guys walking around our garage and the side of the house looking for any kind of trash they may have left behind.  “We don’t want you to run over anything we left behind and have a flat tire” is what they told me. Who does that in this day and time?  Bradberry Service Company does.  They came back to service our unit a couple of weeks ago to make sure it was Winter ready, although the unit was just installed in April, Bradberry Service Company spent a hour looking over everything and making sure we were ready for cooler weather.  We would recommend this group of professionals to anyone and everybody.

resp.text: Thanks for your feedback Amanda! We strive to provide all our customers with excellent service.

text: Beyond great service, very fair prices. Have used several times through the years, getting ready to call tomorrow.

name: Greg Mink
text:
Straightforward assesment of the problem with several options presented - I did not feel "pushed" toward one option over another based on price.  He further explained potential problems I could face down the road, relevant to my specific system, and then further offered suggestions to prolong the life of the existing unit!  Exceedingly knowledgeable and was very tolorent and thorough answering my questions.

The service was scheduled and a technician was onsite within 90 minutes of my inital phone call.  The assesment and service itself was quick and competent, leaving me confident in the repair aware of what caused the problem in the first place.

I will be keeping their number close, and will be recomending them to family and friends.

name: Carolyn Robards
text: My older Trane A/C motor went out on an extremely hot day. I called that day at noon and they had a technician out before closing. My part was something they didn’t have on hand but they went above and beyond to get it for me as soon as possible. They installed it immediately and everyone I came in contact with was very professional, friendly and explained everything to me. I highly recommend this company!

name: David Pilkington
text: Skelton Heating,Cooling is one of the highest quality Companies you can use for your heating and cooling needs.there Tech's are prompt and courteous.Quickly identifies problems and efficiently solved them.A company with solid footing.You can't beat the value.I would definitely recommend.

name: Melissa Atemon
text: We had gotten an estimate from another company previously and not only were they pricier, but we also had to pay for the estimate. Brian came out and gave us an estimate and explained everything very clearly. The day of install they were early and got to work right away. They did an excellent job and were very professional. I will definitely be using them for our future HVAC needs.

name: Andy
text:
Purchased a brand new Trane A/C system.  They beat the next lowest proposal by $350. On top of the best price,  installation was well done.  Experienced technicians were punctual and did a great job; hauled old equipment away; new, larger pad; everything picked up and cleaned up.  Oh yeah, and the salesman was knowledgeable, courteous and respectful.
Good company.

name: larry lang
text: Top quality service from the ladies in the office , maintenance crew and the installers of my new unit. Job well done in a timely manner.

text: I have been using Skeltons since the owner started his business, working out of 1 van. Brian and his company have serviced my home for years. We also use them where I work and we have no complaints. They are all very nice, and know what they are doing. Starting with Amanda, in the office to all of the service techs,  its one heck of a company. We appreciate all you do for us.

text: I recommend Skelton's to everyone.  They have maintained our air conditioners for 5 years now.  They have come out on the weekends when we needed service and we will be calling them to replace our older unit when it comes time.  Great People! Fantastic Service!

name: Matt Blair
text: We've been using Skelton's for years. They are a good family owned business that provides exceptional service. I use them for any HVAC needs at my home and my business. They just recently fixed an attic furnace at my home. Jonathon was professional and courteous. He arrived on time; then he diagnosed and fixed the problem in less than an hour.

name: Ray Brooks
text: After calling 6 different companies to install my gas wall oven, Hemphill was the only company to respond. They did excellent work and the price was very reasonable. A very professional company I would recommend any time.

name: Keith Duffy
text: The tech was great and did. A good job. Very courteous and cleaned up after himself, my biggest complaint is the bill. I admit I did not ask the hourly charge up front . But $160 a hour is way more than I expected. He was at our home for 3 and a half hours and the labor charge was $560.

name: James Crawford
text: Installed new Trane air conditioner. Michael Webb , technician, proved to be a knowledgeable, efficient and professional company representative.  He arrived on time, explained my options and provided the info I needed to arrive at a proper decision . Explained what he would do and delivered a wonderful product and service. I would definitely recommend Hemphill Services .

name: Anne Betbeze
text: Sewage was backing up in the bath tub and we immediately called Hemphill.  They came out promptly and fixed the problem.  We will absolutely call them for all of our plumbing needs in the future.  It is wonderful to know that we now have a reliable,  honest plumber.

name: Jamie Jones
text: This is the 2nd time I have used Hemphill services for HVAC related issues. We moved since the last time I used them but they were 1st on my list to call when I needed service. This company definitely does not disappoint! They are prompt, have very fair pricing, knowledgeable and most of all, courteous. I hands down recommend Hemphill Services and will not hesitate to call them again!!

name: Chez Knox
text: Hemphill is great! They’ve done several things around a house we bought and helped with repairs on the sale of another house. They are super nice and efficient!

name: salma jabeen
text: Called a tech to address.a leak. Tech found an issue with the pipes and had to cut the tile to replace them with brand new ones which was unexpected but fine. My complaint is with the bill. We were overcharged $200 and only caught it when reviewing the itemized receipt and doing the math ourselves. They handled it once we brought it up, but it bothers me that if we hadn't looked at the bill we would have just overpaid. On top of that, $160 a hour seems unreasonable. Most places will do a plumbing job for less than $100 an hour. The leak was small and we ended up paying ~$650 for the whole thing. Good work but will likely go with someone else next time.

name: Brent Bononia
text: We discovered a leaking water heater.  Called Hemphill and they were quick to respond by sending their guys out the same day and did the water tank remove and install the next day.  Service was quick, friendly and a quality repair for a good price!  I would recommend them to anyone!

name: Katrina Gamble Parker
text: Originally called another plumbing company several times and couldn’t get through to get an appointment so I called Hemphill after reading their reviews. A very nice gentleman answered the phone on the second ring and was very polite and helpful. He answered all my questions and sent Adam out this afternoon. Adam was able to properly find the problem and fix it immediately. He informed me each step of the way what the issue was and what it would take to fix it. I received quality work and service and am thankful! I’ll definitely use them again for any plumbing needs in my home and I’d gladly recommend them.

name: Corey Kearse
text: Would recommend Hemphill to anyone looking for plumbing services. Adam showed up on time and solved the problem we were having with our stopped up drain. Price was very reasonable.

name: Gayle Hurley
text: I have used Hemphill for many years (12+) and have always been very happy with their work. I heartily recommend them!

name: Jacob South
text: Called Hemphill at 8:30 am on a Saturday in August because my air stopped working the night before. They were here and gone before lunch and my air is working great. I spoke with Andrew and he sent Michael out to get me back going. He did just that and did it at a very fair price. I was very pleased with their service and professionalism. I won’t hesitate to call back in the future.

name: Jennifer Wills
text: Highly recommend Hemphill services. They are professional, responsive, and honest. We have used them on several occasions now and could not be happier with their customer service.

text: Hemphill was responsive, reasonably priced, and the guys who came to install the ptrap for my sink were professional and so nice!

name: Kobe Singleton
text:
***UPDATE: October 20, 2020

After placing this review I was immediately contacted by Andrew. We had an in depth discussion about a few things and were able to reach an amicable understanding. They came out to give an estimate on the job October 20, 2020. Will give further updates as needed.***

***October 18, 2020

As a business we depend on other business services just as much as customers depend on us. I initially called and spoke with someone who passed my information on to the company representative. The representative called back and gave me a tentative arrival time but never showed. After continously calling, more than 3 times a day a few days in a row, the service representative (Andrew); I practically gave up on this business as an option. The unique thing is that so many people referred me to them.
(Wanted to give one star but gave two simply based on how many other people referred them).***

name: Nancy Owen
text: All I can say is Autumn Air was professional, trustworthy, economical and exceeded all my expectations. There is nothing more aggravating than to have your air conditioning unit quit. Although it is mid-October we needed our air conditioning fixed ASAP. Our unit was 17 years old and I knew we needed to replace it if not immediately, within the very near future. I emailed a few companies Saturday night asking for estimates and to please contact me Monday morning. Only Autumn Air and one other company returned my call today. Autumn Air was very pleasant and offered to have someone come out to price the unit immediately. Since I knew I did not want to start throwing money away repairing such an old unit I asked for a quote for a new unit (with and without the furnace). Skip came out and priced the unit with three options and it was clear if I wanted more options he would give them to me. He did not acted putout or frustrated with my request. He did not pressure me to make a decision nor did he push me to buy the most expensive product. Without me asking, he let me know the specials that were being offered. I asked how soon they could install the unit and he said either this afternoon or in the morning. I called my husband and sent him the estimates. My husband was impressed and even showed his fellow employees who were also impressed with the prices. After weighing the pros and cons we decided to replace the entire unit (with furnace). I called Skip back about 2:30 saying we did want to go ahead and replace the unit, he said he would call me right back, that it would be either this afternoon or in the morning. I was floored when he called me back shortly afterwards and asked if it was okay with me if they could install it today. Skip and two other gentlemen came and installed the unit working hard until close to 9:00 pm. We were all extremely grateful to the diligence of these men. In addition, Autumn Air included a 2-year service plan where they will come out to service/clean the unit twice a year. They have earned my trust. I am very thankful to Autumn Air.
